S06adsp55-u:1_1: [f. 215b] atha bhagavān ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1_2: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā traidhātukāya vā na spṛhayate,
S06adsp55-u:1_5: pratiśrutkopamān yāvan nirmitopamān eva sarvadharmān vyavalokayati,
S06adsp55-u:1_6: na ca sākṣātkaroti. idaṃ subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya-avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_7_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'py anekaśataparivāram anekasahasraparivāraṃ anekaśatasahasraparivāram
S06adsp55-u:1_7_2: devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaiḥ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dharman deśayantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_8: sa tan dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya dharmasya artham ājñāsyāmi iti iti,
S06adsp55-u:1_11: idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva avaivarkalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_12: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_13_0: vaihāyasam abhyudgamya bhikṣusaṃghāya dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ (AdSPG I 4) samanvāgataṃ vyāmaprabhām
S06adsp55-u:1_13_1: ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi sandarśayantaṃ nirmitāni ca nirmimāṇaṃ yāni nirmitāny anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakaryāṇi kurvanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_14: idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_15: punar aparaṃ subhūte sacet svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_16: grāmaghāte vā vartamāne nagaraghāte vā vartamāne agnidāhe vā vartamāne,
S06adsp55-u:1_17: vyādamṛgān vā dṛṣṭvā tadanyāni vā cāṇḍālamṛgajātāni dṛṣṭvā,
S06adsp55-u:1_19: yān vā tadanyāṃ bhayabhairavāṃ saṃtrāsāṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06adsp55-u:1_22: mātṛmaraṇaṃ vā pitṛmaraṇaṃ vā bhrātṛmaraṇaṃ vā bhaginīmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā,
S06adsp55-u:1_23: mitrajñātisālohitamaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā na śokabhayai bhairavaḥ saṃtrāsa utpādyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_24: tataś ca svapnāt samanantaraprativibuddhasya sata evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:1_26: mayāpy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya svapnopamāḥ sarvatraidhātukadharmā deśayitavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_27: idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_29_0: yad avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_29_1: sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti? sacet svapnāntaragato 'pi bodhisattvo [f.
S06adsp55-u:1_30: 216a?] mahāsattvo nairayikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā tiryagyonikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā yamalaukikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06adsp55-u:1_31_0: smṛtipratilabdhasyaivaṃ bhavati tathā kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
S06adsp55-u:1_31_1: buddhakṣetre (AdSPG I 5) sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_32: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi yaś ca svapno yaś ca svapnāntaḥ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06adsp55-u:1_33: idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_34: punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato vā vibuddho vā nagaradāhe vā vartamāne evaṃ samanvāharati:
S06adsp55-u:1_35: ye mayā svapnānataragatena vā vibuddhena vā ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_36: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaivartiko veditavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_37: sacet me te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06adsp55-u:1_38: anena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāha upaśāmyatu śītībhavatv astaṃ gacchatu,
S06adsp55-u:1_40: veditavyaṃ subhūte, vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher avaivartikatāyām.
S06adsp55-u:1_41: sacet punaḥ subhūte so 'gniskandhas tat satyavacanam atikramya gṛhād gṛhaṃ dahaty,
S06adsp55-u:1_42: rathyāyā rathyāyāṃ dahaty, anyāni gṛhāni dahaty anyāni gṛhāni na dahaty,
S06adsp55-u:1_43: anyāḥ rathyā dahaty anyāḥ rathyā na dahati,
S06adsp55-u:1_44_0: veditavyaṃ subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmapratyākhyānasaṃvartanīyam ebhiḥ sattvaiḥ karmopacitaṃ yenaiṣāṃ sattvānām
S06adsp55-u:1_44_1: ekatyāni gṛhāni dahyanta ekatyāni gṛhāni na dahyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_46: tata evaitad dharmapratyākhyānāt sāvaśeṣaṃ karma vipacyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_47: ayaṃ subhūte hetur ayaṃ pratyaya avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:1_48: yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_49: punar aparaṃ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_50: tāny (AdSPG I 6) ākārās tāni liṅgāni tani nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:1_51: sacet subhūte kācid eva strī vā puruṣo vā amanuṣyeṇa adhiṣṭhito bhavet,
S06adsp55-u:1_53_0: saced ahaṃ vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau parisamyaksaṃbuddhair
S06adsp55-u:1_54_0: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_54_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye pariśuddhaś ca me manasikāro 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp55-u:1_55: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittam apagataṃ me pratyekabuddhacittam,
S06adsp55-u:1_57: na ahaṃ na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
S06adsp55-u:1_59: ye te 'pi te asaṃkhyeya-aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_60: na teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcid ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam asākṣātkṛtam anabhisaṃbuddham.
S06adsp55-u:1_61: yathā me te buddhā bhagavanto jānanty āśayam iti hi [f.
S06adsp55-u:1_63: anena satyena satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā yena amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto vā viheṭhito vā so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmatu.
S06adsp55-u:1_64: sacet subhūte so 'manuṣyas tato na apakrāmati,
S06adsp55-u:1_66: veditavyaṃ subhūte na ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:1_67: sacet (AdSPG I 7) punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya so 'manuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmati,
S06adsp55-u:1_68: veditavyaṃ subhūte vyākṛto vatāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:1_69: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhi liṅgair ebhi nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartiko veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_70: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritasya,
S06adsp55-u:1_71: upāyakauśalavirahitasya, acaritāvinaś caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yāvac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vimokṣamukheṣu,
S06adsp55-u:1_72: bodhisattvanyāmam anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_73: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kariṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_74: yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_78: tata kasya hetos? tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatra autsukyam āpatsyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_81: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_83: na punar evaṃ jñāsyati: mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣyo 'pakrānta iti.
S06adsp55-u:1_84: sa tena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullapiṣyati uccagghiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyaty:
S06adsp55-u:1_85: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06adsp55-u:1_86: ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp55-u:1_87: (AdSPG I 8) sa tāvanmātrakeṇa mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati mānam utpādayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_89: sa tathārūpo sattvas tāvatā anupāyakuśalo 'dhimānam utpādayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_91: katame dve bhūmī? yaduta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
S06adsp55-u:1_92: evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena tasya bodhisattvasy a mahāsattvasya mārakarmotpatsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_93: tatra kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyati na pratiseviṣyati na bhakṣiṣyati na paryupāsiṣyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_95: tat kasya hetos? tathāpi ca ṣaṭpāramitāsv acaritvāt upāyakauśalena ca aparigṛhītatvāt.
S06adsp55-u:1_96: evam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_97_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsv acaritāvinaṃ yāvad anavakrāntanyāmaṃ nāmādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati?
S06adsp55-u:1_97_1: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvam evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_98: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau [f.
S06adsp55-u:1_99: 217a?] idan te nāmadheyam idan te mātur nāmadheyam idan te pitur nāmadheyam idan te bhrātur nāmadheyam idan te bhaginyā nāmadheyam imāni te mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ nāmadheyāni.
S06adsp55-u:1_100: yāvad ā saptamasya mātāpitṛyugasya nāmadheyam upadekṣyaty,
S06adsp55-u:1_101: amuṣmāt tvaṃ janapadād amuṣyā diśo 'muṣmiṃ tvaṃ janapade jāto 'muṣmiṃ nagare vā grāme vā.
S06adsp55-u:1_103: sa enam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvāntato 'pi tvam evaṃ mṛduko 'bhūḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_104: sacet tīkṣṇo bhaviṣyati, sa enam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvāntato 'pi tvam evaṃ tīkṣṇo 'bhūḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_105_0: saced āraṇyako bhaviṣyati sacet piṇḍapātiko bhaviṣyati (AdSPG I 9) sacet pāṃsukūliko bhaviṣyati sacet khalu paścādbhaktiko
S06adsp55-u:1_105_1: bhaviṣyati saced ekāsaniko bhaviṣyati sacet prāptapiṇḍiko bhaviṣyati sacec cchmāśāniko bhaviṣyati saced ābhyavakāśiko bhaviṣyati
S06adsp55-u:1_105_2: sacet vṛkṣamūliko bhaviṣyati sacen naiṣadyiko bhaviṣyati saced yāthāsaṃstariko bhaviṣyati sacet traicīvariko bhaviṣyati saced
S06adsp55-u:1_105_3: alpecchaḥ sacet saṃtuṣṭaḥ sacet praviviktaḥ yāvat prajñaḥ saced apagatapādamrakṣaṇaḥ sacen mandabhāṣyo bhaviṣati,
S06adsp55-u:1_106: sa enam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvāntato 'pi tvaṃ mandabhāṣyo 'bhūḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_108: sa enam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvāntato 'pi tvaṃ mandamantro 'bhūḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_109: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te ime evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06adsp55-u:1_110: niścayena te pūrvāntato 'py eta eva dhutaguṇasaṃlekhā abhūvan,
S06adsp55-u:1_111: so 'py anena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena gotrāpadeśena anena ca pratyutpannena dhutaguṇasaṃlekhāpadeśena mananām utpādayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_112: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān saṃmūḍham iti viditvā
S06adsp55-u:1_113: upasaṃkrayaivaṃ vakṣyati: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher avaivartikatāyām.
S06adsp55-u:1_114: tathā te guṇāḥ saṃvidyante. sa kadācid bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_115: sa kadācid bhikṣuṇīveṣeṇa kadācid gṛhapativeṣeṇa kadācin mātṛveṣeṇa kadācit pitṛveṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_116: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:1_117: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi tavaite guṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06adsp55-u:1_119: ye ca te mayā subhūte avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tāni tasya bodhisattvasya na (AdSPG I 10) saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_120: veditavyaṃ subhūte tad anyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair mārādhiṣṭhito vatāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_121: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte yāny ākārā liṅgāni nimittāny avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni tasya na saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_122: anena ca nāmāpadeśena tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate uccagghiṣyaty ullapiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_123: idam api subhūte nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_124: punar aparaṃ subhūte nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_125: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritāvī skandhamāraṃ na jānāti,
S06adsp55-u:1_126: rūpaṃ na jānāti, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñanaṃ na jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:1_127: [f. 217b?] taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān nāmādhiṣṭhānena vyākariṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_128: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyeti idaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati iti.
S06adsp55-u:1_129: yadi ca tena bodhisattvena nāmadheyam anuvitarkitam anuvicintitam anuvicāritaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_131: yat tan mayā nāmadheyaṃ manasā anuvitarkitam anuvincintitam anuvicāritam,
S06adsp55-u:1_132: idaṃ me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_137: yathā ca me nāmadheyam anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ sameti nāma nāmnā ahan tena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti.
S06adsp55-u:1_138: ye ca te mayā subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya (AdSPG I 11) mahāsattvasya ākāra liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tāni tasya bodhisattvasya na saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_139: tena cāsau nāmnā tena ca vyākaraṇāpadeśena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_140: sa tayā atimananatayā dūribhaviṣyaty anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_141: tasyopāyakauśalavirahitasya prajñāpāramitāvirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye,
S06adsp55-u:1_143: atha vā ciraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitvā bhajitvā paryupāsya imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_144: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi na abhīkṣṇaṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06adsp55-u:1_145: sacet tenaiva ca ātmabhāvapratilaṃbhena tān paurvikāṃś cittotpādān na vigarhiṣyati na pratideśayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_148_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śrāvakayānīyo bhikṣuś catasṛṇāṃ mūlāpattīnām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyāpadya abhikṣur bhavaty
S06adsp55-u:1_148_1: aśramaṇo bhavaty aśākyaputrīyaḥ so 'bhavyas tenaiva ātmabhāvena caturṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānām anyatarānyatarañc chrāmaṇyaphalam
S06adsp55-u:1_149: evam eva subhūte gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādo yo nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
S06adsp55-u:1_150: tena ca nāmadheya mātreṇa anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vimaṃsyate avamaṃsyate atimaṃsyate ayan tena gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_151: (AdSPG I 12) iti hi subhūte imāni nāmavyapadeśena utpatsyante mārakarmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi.
S06adsp55-u:1_153: pañcabhyaḥ ānantaryebhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya nāmāpadeśena manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_155: punar aparaṃ subhūte vivekaguṇāpadeśena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_156: vivekasya tathāgato [f. 218a?] varṇavādī na ca ahaṃ subhūte evaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaduta āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni.
S06adsp55-u:1_157_0: āha: kaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi na āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni kīdṛgrūpaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1_157_1: sa bhagavann anyo viveko bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_158_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vivikto bhavati bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1_158_1: mahāsattvaḥ āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu śayyāsaneṣu viharati vivikta eva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_159_0: ayaṃ subhūte viveko mayā anujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anena ced vivekena rātriṃ divaṃ ca viharati vivikta eva viharati
S06adsp55-u:1_159_1: bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 13) mahāsattvaḥ yaś ca mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1_160_0: yaṃ ca punar enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān vivekam upadekṣaty āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu śayyāsaneṣu viharet sa tena vivekena saṃkīrṇa
S06adsp55-u:1_160_1: eva san śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahita prajñāpāramitā anabhisaṃyukto sarvākārajñatāṃ na
S06adsp55-u:1_161: evaṃ so 'nena vihāreṇa viharan na pariśuddhamanasikāra eva saṃs tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_162_0: ye grāmānte viharanti. pariśuddhacitta manasikārāḥ śrāvakacittena asaṃkīrṇāḥ pratyekabuddhacittena asaṃkīrṇās tadanyair vā
S06adsp55-u:1_162_1: pāpakaiś cittotpādair asaṃkīrṇāḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnām abhijñāparijñāparipūriṃ gatāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_163_0: atha ca punaḥ so 'nupāyakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ kiñcāpi yojanaśatikeṣv aṭavīkāntāreṣv anapagatavyāḍamṛgapakṣiṣv anapagatacauracaṇḍāleṣv
S06adsp55-u:1_163_1: anapagatadaṃṣṭṛvyāḍarākṣasa-anuvicariteṣu (AdSPG I 14) tatra madhyagataḥ vā saṃkalpayati varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_163_2: vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ va varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_163_3: vā tato vottari imañ ca vivekaṃ na jānīyād yena vivekena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā adhyāśayasaṃprasthitā viharanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_165: saṃkliṣṭha eva tatra viveke niśrita ālīno 'dhyavasito 'idhyavasitavān,
S06adsp55-u:1_166: na me sa tāvatā cittam abhirādhayati.
S06adsp55-u:1_167: yaś ca mayā viveka ākhyāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tena vivekena samanvāgatas tasminn api sa viveke na saṃdṛśyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_168: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa virahitas tena vivekena.
S06adsp55-u:1_169: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe sthitvaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:1_170: sādhu sādhu kulaputra eṣa sa bhūto vivekas tathāgatena ākhyātaḥ etena tvaṃ vivekena vihara.
S06adsp55-u:1_171: evaṃ tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase.
S06adsp55-u:1_172_0: sa tato vivekāt taṃ vivekaṃ pradhānatamaṃ mānyamānaḥ punar api grāmāntam avatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān bhikṣūn pariśuddhacittamanasikārān
S06adsp55-u:1_174: ye te viviktaṃ vihariṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvās [f.
S06adsp55-u:1_175: 218b] tān saṃkīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty ākīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty atimaṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_179: yatra ca gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ tatra mānam utpādayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_180: tat kasya heto? tathā hi sa maṃsyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_181: aham amanuṣyaiś codye aham amanuṣyaiḥ smārye.
S06adsp55-u:1_183: eṣa subhūte vihāro yena vihāreṇa ahaṃ viharāmi.
S06adsp55-u:1_185: ko grāmāntavihāriṇaḥ smārayiṣyati? evaṃ sa bodhisattvo bodhisattvayānikān kulaputrān atimaṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_186: ayaṃ subhūte pudgalo bodhisattvaś caṇḍālo veditavyo bodhisattvadūṣī veditavyo bodhisattvaprativarṇiko veditavyaḥ cauraḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke cauro veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_187: sa ca punaḥ bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tādṛgjātīyaḥ pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhakṣitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_188: tat kasya hetor? ādhimānikā hi subhūte te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_189: yasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktā sarvākārajñatā aparityaktā ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis,
S06adsp55-u:1_190: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:1_191: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kartukāmena tādṛgjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyā na bhajitavyā na paryupāsitavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_192: api tu khalu svārthayogam anuyuktena bhavitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_193_0: nityam udvignamānasena. saṃsārād uttrastamānasena. asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātuke. tatraiva ca bodhisattvacaṇḍālaiḥ maitry utpādayitavyā
S06adsp55-u:1_195: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaite mama doṣāḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_196: notpatsyante. saced utpatsyante, kṣipram etāṃ prahāsyāmi iti śikṣā karaṇīyā.
S06adsp55-u:1_197: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām svayamabhijñāparākramo veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_198: punar aparaṃ subhute (AdSPG I 16) bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhajitavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:1_199: āha: kāni punar bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_200: buddhā bhagavantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_201: bodhisattvā api subhūte mahāsattvā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_202: śrāvakā api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_203: ye ca ṣaṭpāramitān ākhyāyanti deśayanti prakāśayanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_205: ime 'pi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:1_206: punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_207: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:1_208: tathatā bhūtakoṭir dharmadhātur bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:1_209: punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro veditavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_210: ṣaṭpāramitā mārgaḥ, ṣaṭpāramitā ālokaḥ. ṣaṭpāramitā ulkā avabhāso buddhir medhā prajñā,
S06adsp55-u:1_211: ṣaṭpāramitās trāṇaṃ, ṣaṭparamitāḥ śaraṇaṃ, ṣaṭpāramitā parāyaṇaṃ, ṣaṭpāramitā mātā. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusandhi prahāṇāya saṃvartate.
S06adsp55-u:1_212: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye 'pi te 'bhūvann (AdSPG I 17) atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:1_213: teṣāṃ api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhūvan.
S06adsp55-u:1_214: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhaviṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_215: ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_216: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau.
S06adsp55-u:1_217: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ato niiyātā atītānāgata pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas.
S06adsp55-u:1_218: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:1_220: sattvāṃ paripācayitukāmena, caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvāḥ saṃgṛhītavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_221: katamaiś caturbhir? yaduta dānena priyavacane na arthacaryayā samānārthatayā.
S06adsp55-u:1_222: imam apy ahaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
S06adsp55-u:1_224: layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ yaduteṣā eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā.
S06adsp55-u:1_225: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:1_228: sattvāṃś ca paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_229: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ te dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_230: subhūtir āha: kiṃlakṣaṇā bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_234: āha: syād bhagavaṃ paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_235: evam etat subhūte evam etat yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_236: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_237: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇeṇa prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_240: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmair viviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
S06adsp55-u:1_241: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ prajñāyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_242: na hi bhagavaṃ viviktam saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_244: na viviktaṃ na? śūnyatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_245: na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_246: na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ sattva upalabhyate yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta asya bhagavaṃ vayaṃ bhāṣitasya katham arthan ājānīyāma? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_247: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti? āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_248: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_250: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakārau viviktau śūnyau? aha:
S06adsp55-u:1_252: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsaranti saṃdhāvanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_253: āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_255: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvasaṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate:
S06adsp55-u:1_256: yatra na ahaṃkāro na mamakāraḥ tatra nodgrāhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_257: (AdSPG I 19) nodgrahaḥ na tatra sattvāḥ sandhāvanti na saṃsaranti,
S06adsp55-u:1_258: na tatra saṃkleśaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_259: āha: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carali,
S06adsp55-u:1_260: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati.
S06adsp55-u:1_261: na caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati yāvan na aṣṭādaśeṣv āveṇikeṣu buddharmeṣu carati.
S06adsp55-u:1_262: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yaś cared yata vā cared yatra vā cared.
S06adsp55-u:1_263: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anavamardanīyo bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:1_264: sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena. evaṃ caraṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair na śakyam abhibhavitum.
S06adsp55-u:1_265: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'nabhibhūtasthāne sthito yaduta bodhisattvanyāme,
S06adsp55-u:1_266: anabhibhūto hi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñātāmanasikāreṇa avirahita evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñatayā abhyāśī bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:1_267: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte [f. 220a] yāvatyo jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran,
S06adsp55-u:1_268: mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeran,
S06adsp55-u:1_269: tān ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā.
S06adsp55-u:1_270: yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
S06adsp55-u:1_271: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06adsp55-u:1_272: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaved? ahā:
S06adsp55-u:1_273_0: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro (AdSPG I 20) vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1_273_1: prasaved yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānikuryāt saṃprakāśayet
S06adsp55-u:1_274: evaṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāṃs te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheraṃs,
S06adsp55-u:1_275: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06adsp55-u:1_276: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣu apramāṇeṣu catasriṣv ārūpyasamāpattīṣu yāvat srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgamīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06adsp55-u:1_277: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tāñ ca kuśalamūlān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayet,
S06adsp55-u:1_278: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_279: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06adsp55-u:1_280: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair viharet,
S06adsp55-u:1_281: sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:1_282: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi na kasyacit sattvasya tādṛśo vihāro yādṛśo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:1_284: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te kulaputrā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto mahāmaitrīm abhinirharanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_287: te tena vihāreṇa viharaṃto muditayā pramodanto 'bhipramodanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_289: te tena nimittena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasanti.
S06adsp55-u:1_290_0: te mahopekṣāṃ pratilabhante. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvanāṃ mahāṃ prajñāloko yaduta dānapāramitālokaḥ śīlapāramitālokāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1_291: anabhisaṃbuddhā api te kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_294: 220b] te prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharanto dāyakadānapatīnāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayanti,
S06adsp55-u:1_296: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgam upadeśayitukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:1_301: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tair prajñāpāramitāpratisamuyktair manasikārair viharet tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā eva kathā kathitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:1_302: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān eva kathān kathitvā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair eva manasikārair vihartavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1_303: tena prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktamanasikāreṇa viharatā anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1_304: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathā tair eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair rātriṃ divam anikṣiptadhuro (AdSPG I 22) viharet.
S06adsp55-u:1_305: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacid eva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnam apratilabdhapūrvaṃ bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:1_306: so yena samayena pratilabheta tan maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya udāreṇa prītiprāmodyasaumanasyena samanvāgato bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:1_307: tasya sahapratilambham eva tan maṇiratnaṃ punaḥ praṇaśyet sa tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyukto bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:1_308: sa? tasya satatasamitaṃ ratnapratisaṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarterann:
S06adsp55-u:1_309: aho vatāhaṃ tena manoramena maṇiratnena visaṃyukta iti.
S06adsp55-u:1_310: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnam idam iti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:1_311: na ca tat sarvākārajñatāratna nāmitavyam eva satataṃ sukhasaumanasya bahulo bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1_312: āha: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvamanasikārā svabhāvena virahitāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:1_313: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati? na hi virahite bodhisattva upalabhyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_315: bhagavān āha: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti:
S06adsp55-u:1_317_0: te na śrāvākaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair kṛtā na ca buddhair bhagavadbhir kṛtā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā
S06adsp55-u:1_317_1: dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_319: tat kasya hetor? [f. 221a] eṣā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā,
S06adsp55-u:1_320: svabhāvena śūnyā, sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_321: āha: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:1_322: kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudagamya (AdSPG I 23) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_323: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgamya vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06adsp55-u:1_324: na bhūtakoṭir vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06adsp55-u:1_325: na dharmadhātur vivardhate vā parihīyate vā.
S06adsp55-u:1_326: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā ekaṃ na dve,
S06adsp55-u:1_327: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na santrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:1_328: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyās sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartyadhātau.
S06adsp55-u:1_330: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā riktatā vaśikatā asārakatā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_331: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tato 'nyatra bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_332: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kaccit punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_333: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kaccit punar bhagavaṃc chūnyatā śūnyatāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha :
S06adsp55-u:1_334: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kaccit punar bhagavan anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_335: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:1_337: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan ṣaṭpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:1_338: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_339: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā rūpaśūnyatāriktatātucchatā-asārakatātathatā-avitathatā-ananyatathatā,
S06adsp55-u:1_340: dharmatā dharmadhātu dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ (AdSPG I 24) sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavan āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_341_0: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatāriktatātucchatā-asārakatātathatā-avitathatā-ananyatathatā
S06adsp55-u:1_341_1: dharmatā dharmadhātu dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_342: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: sacet punar bhagavann ete dharmā na caranti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1_343: tat kathaṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_344: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:1_345: 221b] carati? āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvam tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra bodhisattvena caritavyam? āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_346: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yad dharma yaṃ tvaṃ na samanupaśyasi.
S06adsp55-u:1_348: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo nopalabhyate api nu sa dharma utpatsyate vā nirotsyate vā? āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_349: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1_351: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛyate buddhair bhagavadbhir anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:1_352: iyam ucyate subhūte daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvin mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā pratisaṃvider tāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1_354: evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamāṇaḥ (AdSPG I 25) evaṃ vyāyacchamāno anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhajñānaṃ mahājñānaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti.
S06adsp55-u:1_355: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:1_356: tasya na kadācit teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1_358: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām utpādāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_359: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_360: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tat kiṃ bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_361: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: sacet punar bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito bodhisattvo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp55-u:1_362: tat katham idānīṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_363: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tad dharmaṃ yo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau? āha:
S06adsp55-u:1_364: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. na nahan tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:1_365: tam apy ahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate yena vā dharmeṇa abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_366: .... tā. bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmān anupalaṃbhamānasya (AdSPG I 26) bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavaty.
S06adsp55-u:1_367: aham abhisaṃbhotsye. anena abhisaṃbhotsyate idam abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:1_368: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarva ete vikalpā na saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:1_369: tat [f. 222a] kasya hetoḥ? avikalpā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:3_0: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_1: gaṃbhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā dudṛśyā duranubodhā atarkyā atarkā avacarā yāvat sūkṣmā nipuṇā paṇḍitavijñāvedanīyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā atyantiviviktatām upādāya.
S06adsp55-u:3_2: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:3_3_0: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tathātvāya ca pratipatsyante na ca
S06adsp55-u:3_3_1: anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsjante.
S06adsp55-u:3_4: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśika evam etat. na te sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayisyanti vācayiṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:3_5: tathātvāya ca pratipatsyante na ca anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti.
S06adsp55-u:3_7_0: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika ye ca yāvantyo jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuś
S06adsp55-u:3_7_1: caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ paṃcabhir abhijñābhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:3_8: yaś ca kaluputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipadyeta.
S06adsp55-u:3_9: (AdSPG I 28) asya kauśika kuśalamūlasya etat paurvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06adsp55-u:3_11: kotitamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti.
S06adsp55-u:3_12: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06adsp55-u:3_13: atha anyataro bhikṣu. śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_14: abhibhūtā kaubhikṣu (sic). śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_15_0: abhibhūtā kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā te sarvajāṃcaturdhyānasamanvāgatāś (sic) caturapramāṇasamanvāgatāś caturārūpyasamāpattisamanvāgatāḥ
S06adsp55-u:3_15_1: paṃcābhijñāsamanvāgatā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām avikṣiptena cittena udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tathātvāyā
S06adsp55-u:3_16: na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyati,
S06adsp55-u:3_18: evam ukte śakro devānām indras taṃ bhikṣum etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_19_0: ekacittotpādena bhikṣos tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena te sarvajāṃbudvīpakā sattvā daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatāś caturdhyānasamanvāgatāś
S06adsp55-u:3_20: kaḥ punar vādo ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati [f.
S06adsp55-u:3_21: 222b] paryavāpsyati udgṛhyā dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipatsyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_22: tena sadevamānuṣāsuro loko abhibhūto bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:3_23: na kevalaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattva mahāsattvo.
S06adsp55-u:3_24: ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino (AdSPG I 29) 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhās tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_26: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃty upāyakauśalavirahitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_28: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva.
S06adsp55-u:3_29: na kevalaṃ ye kṣānti pāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:3_30: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitās prajñāpāramitayā virahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva.
S06adsp55-u:3_32: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_33: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:3_34: te sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyam abhibhavitum.
S06adsp55-u:3_35: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuvartate,
S06adsp55-u:3_37: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatān na dūrīkaroti.
S06adsp55-u:3_38: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ pratipadyamāno na virāgayati bodhimaṇḍam.
S06adsp55-u:3_39: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān saṃsīdān uddhartukāmaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_40: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:3_42: evaṃ (AdSPG I 30) śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya catvāro maharājāno upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:3_43_0: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti: śīghraṃ bho mahāpuruṣa śikṣasva laghu śikṣasva imāni tāni catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā parigṛhītavyāni
S06adsp55-u:3_43_1: bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya yāni parigrahītāni paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhai.
S06adsp55-u:3_44: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāparamitāyām upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante catvāro mahārājakāyikāḥ devarājā.
S06adsp55-u:3_45: sārdhaṃ mahārājakāyikair devaputrai punar trāyastriṃśa devaputrā apy enam upsaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte.
S06adsp55-u:3_46: sārdhaṃ trāyastriṃśair devaputraiḥ suyāmo 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:3_47: sārdhaṃ yāmair devaputrai saṃtuṣito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:3_48: sārdhaṃ tuṣitair devaputraiḥ nirmito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte.
S06adsp55-u:3_49: sārdhaṃ nirmāṇāratibhir devaputraiḥ vaśavarty api devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06adsp55-u:3_50: sārdhaṃ vaśavartibhir devaputraiḥ brahmāpi sahaṃpatir upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_51: sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikair devaputraiḥ ābhāsvarā api devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte.
S06adsp55-u:3_53: 223a] sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06adsp55-u:3_54: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭhāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:3_55: tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nityaṃ samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:3_56_0: evaṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāni kānicil laukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramāṇi
S06adsp55-u:3_56_1: (AdSPG I 31) kāye utpatsyante tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante.
S06adsp55-u:3_57: na nipatiṣyanti. ime bhikṣor dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇā bhaviṣyanti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_58: tasmin samaye yāni tāni sannipātikāni glānyāni,
S06adsp55-u:3_59: tadyathā cakṣurogaḥ śrotrarogaḥ jihvārogo dantaśūlaṃ kāyaśūlaṃ cittaśūlaṃ yāvat tāni sarvāṇi kāye notpatsyante na nipatiṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:3_60: ime bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_62: kim ayaṃ śakro devānām indra ātmīyena svakena pratibhānena prajñāpāramitām upadiśati.
S06adsp55-u:3_63: prajñāpāramitāyāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāna utāho buddha anubhāvena? atha śakro devānām indra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_64: buddha anubhāva eṣa bhadanta ānanda veditavyo yo 'haṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśāmi.
S06adsp55-u:3_66: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:3_67: evam etat ānanda evam etat, tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāva tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
S06adsp55-u:3_68: yac chakro devānām indraḥ prajñāpāramitām upadiśati.
S06adsp55-u:3_70: yasmin khalu punar samaye ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06adsp55-u:3_71: tasmiṃ samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃs te sarve saṃśayaprāptā bhavaṃti:
S06adsp55-u:3_72: kim ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūtakotiṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyati (AdSPG I 32) sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhatvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvam anuprāpsyati,
S06adsp55-u:3_73_0: utāho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyā
S06adsp55-u:3_73_1: avirahito bhavati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃc chokaśalyaviddho bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:3_74: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān ulkapātān avasṛjati.
S06adsp55-u:3_75: bhayaṃ janayaty apy eva nāma bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avalīnatā bhavet romaharṣo vā bhaved avalīnacittatā vā bhaved ekacittavikṣepo vā bhavet sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt.
S06adsp55-u:3_77: kina punar bhagavan sarvān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:3_78: na khalv ānanda sarvāṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_80_0: 223b] bhagavān āha: yeṣām ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pūrvāntataḥ iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:3_80_1: cittaṃ nādhimuktaṃ tāṃ māra pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_81: punar aparam ānanda ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvā saṃśayaprāptā 'bhūvan syād veyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na vā syād iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:3_82: etān ānanda māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_83: punar (AdSPG I 33) aparam ānanda bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:3_84: so 'paśyaṃ kalyāṇamitram imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śṛṇoti.
S06adsp55-u:3_85: aśṛṇvan na jānāti, ajānaṃ na tathātvāyā pratipadyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_87: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahitaḥ asaddharmaparigrāhaṃ karoty asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avakāśaṃ labhate.
S06adsp55-u:3_88: punar aparam ānanda prajñāpāramitayā virahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate,
S06adsp55-u:3_90: sahāyako 'yaṃ mama yo asaddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06adsp55-u:3_91: bahūnām apy eṣa bodhisatttvayānikānāṃ sahāyako labdho yo 'saddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp55-u:3_93: yat te bodhisattvayānikā dvayor bhūmyo sthāsyanti.
S06adsp55-u:3_95: punar aparam ānanda kiyadrūpasya bodhisattvasya māro 'vatāraṃ labhate? yo bodhisattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamaṇāyām evaṃ vadati:
S06adsp55-u:3_96: gaṃbhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kin te 'nayā gaṃbhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā śrutayā bhāṣitayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā? aham eva tāvad gādhaṃ nopalabhe.
S06adsp55-u:3_97: kutas tvaṃ lapsyase? asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpiyān avatāraṃ labhate.
S06adsp55-u:3_98: punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo 'nyatarān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamanyate:
S06adsp55-u:3_99: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi yāvad ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carasi yāvan na tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carasi,
S06adsp55-u:3_100: asyāpy (AdSPG I 34) ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_101_0: punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ samaye bodhisattva ātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ manyate tasminn ānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyān tuṣṭo bhavaty
S06adsp55-u:3_101_1: udagra āttamanaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati tasyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ labhate.
S06adsp55-u:3_102: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā parikīrtitaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:3_103: sa tena nāmagrahanena vā gotragrahaṇena vā tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān yāvat kalyāṇadharmāṇo 'bhimanyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_104: ātmānam utkarṣayati. paraṃ paṃsayati. te cāsya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06adsp55-u:3_105: yāny avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvanāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni.
S06adsp55-u:3_106: sa tair ākāraliṅganimittair asaṃvidyamānai kleśam utpādayaty ātmānaṃ cotkarṣayati paraṃś ca paṃsayati.
S06adsp55-u:3_107: evaṃ ca vadati: na tvam atra bodhisattvayāne sandṛśyase na bodhisattvagotre sandṛśyase,
S06adsp55-u:3_109: sa tena tāṃ bodhisattvayānikān pudgalāṃ kutsayati paṃsayati.
S06adsp55-u:3_111: aśūnyaṃ me bhavanaṃ bhaviṣyaty utsadā bhaviṣyanti mahānarakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ [f.
S06adsp55-u:3_112: 224a] pretaviṣayaś ca. tathā tathā ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs taṃ bodhisattvam adhiṣṭhāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:3_114: tasya tayā ādeyavacanatayā bahujanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhatavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06adsp55-u:3_116: te dṛṣṭānugītam āpadyamānās tathātvāya (AdSPG I 35) śikṣiṣyante:
S06adsp55-u:3_117: te tathātvāya śikṣamāṇās tathātvāya pratipadyamānāḥ kleśaṃ vardhayiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:3_118: evaṃ te viparyastayā santatyā yad yad eva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā sarvaṃ tad aniṣṭhatvāya akāntatvāya amana āpatvāya saṃvartiṣyate.
S06adsp55-u:3_119: evaṃ te mahānarakā utsadā bhaviṣyanti tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ pretaviṣaya utsado bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:3_121: imam ānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān āttamanā bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:3_123: punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayānikena kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ vivadati ahaṃ pradhānataro na tvaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:3_127: tat kasya hetoḥ? naite kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādā sarvākārajñatāyā mārgaḥ narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_128: punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'pareṇa bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena
S06adsp55-u:3_129: sārdhaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ karoti tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:3_132: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi naiṣa (AdSPG I 36) mārgaḥ naiṣa pratipat sarvākārajñatāyā ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:3_133: narakatiryagyoniyamalokamārga eṣa ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_134: punar aparam ānanda saced avyākṛto bodhisattvo vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya antike cittam āghātayet kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ kuryāt,
S06adsp55-u:3_135: tena punar eva tāvata eva kalpān samnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ yāvanto 'sya te cittotpādāḥ pāpakā utpannāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān kurvataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_137: ānanda āha: asti punar bhagavann eṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ niḥsaraṇatā utāho tāvata eva kalpāṃs tena saṃnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:3_138: sanniḥsaraṇo mayā ānanda dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām.
S06adsp55-u:3_139_0: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahet vā vivadeta vā ākrośed vā paribhāṣeta
S06adsp55-u:3_139_1: vā kalahitvā vivadya ākruṣya paribhāṣya na pratideśayed anuśayaṃ vahed anubaddho 'nuśayena viharen,
S06adsp55-u:3_140: na aham ānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06adsp55-u:3_141: avaśyam eva tena pudgalena tāvata eva kalpāṃ sannāha sannaddhavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:3_143: yaḥ punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalahitvā vivadya ākruśya paribhāṣya pratideśayati.
S06adsp55-u:3_145: durlabdhā me lābhā yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkham apahartavyaṃ tad ahaṃ mantrite pratimantrayāmi.
S06adsp55-u:3_147: so 'haṃ parasya apriyaṃ (AdSPG I 37) vadāmi prativacanaṃ dadāmi.
S06adsp55-u:3_148: evam api me na kartavyam. jaḍaiḍamūkasadṛśena me bhavitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:3_150_0: yat mayaite sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya tad aham atraiva vyāpadye tad aham atraiva
S06adsp55-u:3_150_1: kṣubhyāmi na mayātra vyāpattavyaṃ na mayātra kṣubhitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:3_151: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sanniḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06adsp55-u:3_152: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate.
S06adsp55-u:3_153: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsargo na kartavyam.
S06adsp55-u:3_154: sacet tiṣṭhante na kasyacid antike vyāpattavyaṃ na kṣubhitavyam.
S06adsp55-u:3_155: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham eṣām antike vyāpadyeyaṃ vā kṣubhyeyaṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:3_156: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ete mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:3_157: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:3_159: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikasya pudgalasya antike sthātavyam.
S06adsp55-u:3_160: tat kasya hetor? eṣa me sahāyaka ekanau samārūḍho yathaivānena śikṣitavyaṃ tathaiva me śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:3_161: yatraiva anena śikṣitavyaṃ. tatraiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ. dānapāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 38) yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:3_163: saṃbodhimārgadeśaka eṣa me. sacet punar eṣa vyavakīrṇe vihared apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na mayātra śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:3_164: sacet punar eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito viharet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair mayā 'py evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:3_165: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samaśikṣo bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:5_1: katamā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā.
S06adsp55-u:5_6: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:5_7: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_8: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:5_9: yad rūpasya virāgāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_10: yad rūpasya nirodhāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_11: yad rūpasya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_12: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_13: evaṃ yāvad bodher virāgāya nirodhāya anutpādāya [f.
S06adsp55-u:5_15: bhagavān āha: yat subhūtiḥ sthavira evam āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_16: yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_17: yāvad yad rūpasya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_18: yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_19: yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya (AdSPG I 40) anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:5_20: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_21: evaṃ yad bodher virāgāya nirodhāya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_22: vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā,
S06adsp55-u:5_23: yāvad yā bodhes tathatā yāvad yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_24: api nu sā tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā? āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_25: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ no hīdaṃ sugata.
S06adsp55-u:5_26: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_27: na tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā.
S06adsp55-u:5_28: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_29: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_31: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_32: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitām anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:5_33: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyate mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir dharṣayitum.
S06adsp55-u:5_34: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣipram eva avaivartyabhūmim anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:5_35: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake paitṛke tathāgatagocare (AdSPG I 41) carati.
S06adsp55-u:5_36: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāthakaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_37: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_39: sattvaparipākāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas triparivartadvādaśākāradharmacakrapravartanāya śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_40: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi iti śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_41: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatavaṃśasya anupacchedāya śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_42: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ amṛtasya dvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate,
S06adsp55-u:5_44: na subhūte śakyaṃ hīnasattvair ihodāraśikṣāyāṃ śikṣituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_45: sarvasattvān saṃsārād uddhartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_46: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na narakeṣu upapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_47: na tiryagyonau na yamaloke na pratyaṃtimeṣu janapadeṣu upapadyate na pukkasacaṇḍālakuleṣu upapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_48_0: na kāṇo bhavati. na kubjo bhavati. na laṃgo bhavati. nonāṇgo bhavati. na badhiro bhavati. na paṅkapatito bhavati. na vikalendriyo
S06adsp55-u:5_48_1: bhavati. paripūrṇendriyo bhavati, na aparipūrṇendriyaḥ. na prāṇātipātiko bhavati. nādattādāyī [f. 225b] na kāmamithyācāriko
S06adsp55-u:5_48_2: (AdSPG I 42) na mṛṣāvādī na paiśuniko na pāruṣikaḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpī na abhidhyālur na vyāpannacitto na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:5_49: saṃkalpayati. na abhūta parigrāhako bhavati na duḥśīlaparigrāhako bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:5_50: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_51: tat kasya hetor? asty asyopāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_52: tat punaḥ katamad? yaduta ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalam upadiṣṭaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_55: na dhyānānām apramāṇānām ārūpyāsamāpattīnāṃ ca vaśena upapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_56: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmabalapariśuddhim adhigacchati.
S06adsp55-u:5_59: tat katamasya dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhim adhigacchati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_60: evam etat subhāte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi.
S06adsp55-u:5_62: evaṃ pariśuddheṣu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā cittasya asaṃsīdanatā,
S06adsp55-u:5_63: anavalīnatā, iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat sarvabālapṛthagjanā etāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06adsp55-u:5_64: teṣāṃ (AdSPG I 43) sattvānāṃ kṛte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp55-u:5_65_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmabalavaiśāradyatāṃ pratilabhate na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06adsp55-u:5_65_1: patati evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditānāṃ pāraṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:5_66: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te mahāpṛthivīpradeśā yatra jāṃbūnadaṃ survarṇaṃ jātarūpam utpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_67: evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante,
S06adsp55-u:5_69: ato bahutarāḥ te sattvāḥ ye śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā saṃpratiṣṭhante.
S06adsp55-u:5_70: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye cakravartirājasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante.
S06adsp55-u:5_71: ato bahutarās te sattvāḥ ye koṭṭarājasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante.
S06adsp55-u:5_72: evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye imaṃ sarvajñatāmārgaṃ samārohanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_73: ato bahutarāḥ sattvāḥ ye śrāvākapratyekabuddhamārgaṃ samārohanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_74: ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:5_75: ato 'lpatarakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathātvāya pratipadyante,
S06adsp55-u:5_76: ato bahutarā ye śrāvakatvāya vā pratyekabuddhatvāya vā tiṣṭhanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_77: ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ viharantaḥ niḥsaṃśayena (AdSPG I 44) avaivartikabhūmim ākrāmanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_78: ataḥ prabhūtatarā ye na avaivartikabhūmim avakrāmanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_80: 226a] avaivartikabhūmim aimprāptukāmena avaivartikabhūmau gaṇanāṃ dāntukāmenehaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_81: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata na mātsaryasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:5_94: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:5_95: anupalabhamāno na kvacid dharme cittam utpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:5_96_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhītā
S06adsp55-u:5_96_1: bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ samudānitā bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ anugatā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_97: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām 6arvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_98: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatāny antargatāni bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_99: (AdSPG I 45) evam eva subhūte iha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_100: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya kālagatasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvendriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:5_101: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:5_103: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvapāramitānāṃ pāraṃgantukāmena iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_104: iha punaḥ subhūte gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām agryatāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:5_105: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ api nu te bahavaḥ? āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_107: jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvad bhagavaṃ sattvā bahavaḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:5_108: bhagavān āha: yāvantaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve anupūrvacaramaṃ mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeraṃs.
S06adsp55-u:5_109: teṣāṃ sarveṣām ekaikaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhan taṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upattiṣṭhet,
S06adsp55-u:5_110: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasucīta? āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_111_0: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān [f. 226b] āha: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati
S06adsp55-u:5_111_1: (AdSPG I 46) ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:5_112: tathātvāya ca pratipatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:5_114: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām anuttareṇa.
S06adsp55-u:5_118: andhānāṃ cakṣuṣā bhavitukāmena avidyāndhakāraprakṣiptānāṃ dīpena bhavitukāmena.
S06adsp55-u:5_119: buddhatvam anuprāptukāmena buddhaviṣayam anugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena.
S06adsp55-u:5_120: buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhabherīṃ parāhantukāmena buddhaśaṃkhaṃ pravātukāmena buddhasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena ihaiva gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_121: tat kasya hetor? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na sā kācit saṃpattir yāṃ na pratilabhate.
S06adsp55-u:5_122: yā anena na pratilabdhavyā. subhūtir āha: śrāvakasaṃpattir api bhagavann anena pratilabhdavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:5_123: pratyekabuddhasaṃpattir apy anena pratilabdhavyāḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:5_126: tatra ca na sthātavyaṃ na pratiṣṭhātavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_127: jñānena ca darśanena ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā atikramitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:5_129: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā (AdSPG I 47) abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:5_130: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:5_131: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ye tadanye dakṣiṇīyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:5_134: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati prajñāpāramitāṃ carati ca prajñāpāramitāyām avirahitaś ca prajñāpāramitāyā.
S06adsp55-u:5_135: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparihāṇadharma veditavyaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā,
S06adsp55-u:5_136: dūrīkaroti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp55-u:5_138: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, iha prajñāpāramitā, anayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvākārajñātām āhariṣyāmi iti,
S06adsp55-u:5_139: saced evaṃ jānāti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:5_142: tam api na jānāti na paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:5_143: yasya prajñāpāramitā yena vā prajñāpāramitā yo vā prajñāpāramitayā [f.
S06adsp55-u:5_147: na anayā prajñāpāramitayā kaścid dharmo niryāti sthitatvād dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭeḥ.
S06adsp55-u:5_148: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūc:
S06adsp55-u:7_1_0: carann api iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ śilapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:7_1_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sarvasattvān abhibhavati.
S06adsp55-u:7_3: sulabdhāḥ taiḥ sattvail lābhāḥ sujīvitāṃ ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati.
S06adsp55-u:7_4: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_5: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpāditam utpādayiṣyanti imāṃ ca prajnāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvantaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_6_0: atha śakro devānām indro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais
S06adsp55-u:7_6_1: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma.
S06adsp55-u:7_8: ye bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim adhyālambante,
S06adsp55-u:7_9: teṣām anena kuśalamūlena buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu sarvākārajñatādharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu.
S06adsp55-u:7_12: na hi me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_13: yad bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nuttarasyai (AdSPG I 49) samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthito vivarteta.
S06adsp55-u:7_14: na me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartya śrāvakatve vā pratyekabodhau vā patet.
S06adsp55-u:7_15: api tu khalu janayec chandam anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:7_16: bhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ kuryād anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06adsp55-u:7_17: imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā arthakāmo hitakāmaḥ sukhakāmo yogakṣemakāmaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyaibhiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vicunuyāt.
S06adsp55-u:7_18: kim iti vayaṃ tīrṇā atīrṇān sattvāṃs tārayema,
S06adsp55-u:7_19: kim iti vayaṃ muktā amuktān sattvān mocayema.
S06adsp55-u:7_20: kim iti vayam āśvāstā anāśvāstān sattvān āśvāsayema,
S06adsp55-u:7_21: [f. 227b] kim iti vayaṃ parinirvṛtā aparinirvṛtān sattvān parinirvāpayema.
S06adsp55-u:7_22: kiyat sa bhagavaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaved.
S06adsp55-u:7_23: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta.
S06adsp55-u:7_24_0: ciracaritānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta avaivartikānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:7_24_1: tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta ekajātipratibaddhānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta? evam ukte bhagavāṃc
S06adsp55-u:7_25: syāt kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:7_26: na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃś cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_27: syāt kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_28: na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ (AdSPG I 50) cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_29: syāt punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣu yaḥ apskandhas tasya apskandhasya śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā udakabindūnām utkṣipyamāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_30: na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_31: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:7_32: mārādhiṣṭhitā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:7_33: mārapakṣikā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:7_34: mārabhavanād bhagavaṃs te sattvāś cyutā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante.
S06adsp55-u:7_35: tat kasya hetoḥ? mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi bhagavaṃs te sattvā ya imāṃś cittotpādān abhinirhṛtya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_36: anumoditavyās te cittotpādā ye 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittotpādā utpāditā.
S06adsp55-u:7_37: yeṣām aparityakto buddhaḥ aparityakto dharmaḥ aparityaktaḥ saṃghas,
S06adsp55-u:7_41: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśika evam etat. tathā yathā vadasi. ya imān kauśika cittotpādān anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:7_42: te kṣipram eva tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:7_43: ārāgya na virāgayiṣyanti. evaṃ te ebhir anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:7_45: na ca te jātv amanaāpaṃ rūpaṃ drakṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_47: (AdSPG I 51) na amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti na amanaāpān rasān āsvādayiṣyanti na amanaāpān sparśān sprakṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_49: na ca te jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_53_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika taiḥ kulaputraiś ca kuladuhitṛbhiś ca asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:7_53_1: kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni dvitīyabhūmisthitānāṃ tṛtīyabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad daśamībhūmīsthitānāṃ yāvad ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:7_54: taiś ca kuśalamūlair vivardhamānair anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāśībhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_55: te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_56_0: tad anena api kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:7_56_1: kuśalamūlāny anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ na anyatra cittena.
S06adsp55-u:7_57: cārikāṃ caratām avaivartikānām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ na anyatra cittena.
S06adsp55-u:7_58: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad (AdSPG I 52) avocat:
S06adsp55-u:7_59: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_60: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ? āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_61: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na ahaṃ bhagavan māyāṃ na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:7_62: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. yatra na māyā na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tac cittaṃ yac cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate? āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_63: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi.
S06adsp55-u:7_65: no hīdāṃ bhagavaṃ na ahaṃ bhagavann anyatra māyāyā nānyatra māyopamāc cittāt tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:7_68: kataman dharmam upadekṣyāmy astitā vā nāstitā vā veti? yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti.
S06adsp55-u:7_69: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06adsp55-u:7_70: na ca asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_71: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante.
S06adsp55-u:7_73_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā atyantatayā viviktā dhyānapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā vīryapāramitā atyantatayā
S06adsp55-u:7_73_1: viviktā kṣāntipāramitā atyantatayā viviktā śīlapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā.
S06adsp55-u:7_74: dānapāramitā (AdSPG I 53) atyantatayā viviktā yāvad bodhir atyantatayā vivikta.
S06adsp55-u:7_77: nāpi sā kasyacid dharmasya āhartrī prajñāpāramitā atyantaviśuddhatvāt.
S06adsp55-u:7_79: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate? anuttarāpi samyaksaṃbodhir atyantatayā viviktā,
S06adsp55-u:7_80: tat kathaṃ viviktena viviktasya anubodho bhavati? bhagavān aha:
S06adsp55-u:7_81: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte evam etat.
S06adsp55-u:7_83_0: atyantavivktā hi dhyānapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi vīryapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi kṣāntipāramitā atyantaviviktā hi śīlapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:7_83_1: atyantaviviktā hi dānapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi yāvad bodhiḥ atyantaviviktā hi yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06adsp55-u:7_85: yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathā atyantaviviktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_86: sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā na atyantaviviktā syād yāvat sarvākārajñatā na atyantaviviktā syāt na sā syāt prajñāpāramitā yāvan na sā syāt sarvākārajñatā,
S06adsp55-u:7_87: tasmāt tarhi subhūte yathā prajñāpāramitā atyantaviviktā yathā yāvat sarvākārajñatā atyantaviviktā.
S06adsp55-u:7_88: evaṃ hi subhūte na prajñāpāramitām anāgamya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_92: āha: gaṃbhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_93: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, gaṃbhīre subhūte arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_94: duṣkarakārakaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 54) mahāsattva yad gaṃbhīre 'rthe carati.
S06adsp55-u:7_95: ca arthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti. yaduta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:7_96: āha: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi.
S06adsp55-u:7_97: na kiṃcid duṣkaraṃ karoti. kathaṃ duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bhagavaṃ so 'rtho nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_99: yayā sākṣatkṛyeta, so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt.
S06adsp55-u:7_103_0: yaṃ sākṣātkṛtya nottrasyati. na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadya bhagavann anupalaṃbhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caraṃ bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:7_104: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp55-u:7_105: cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati.
S06adsp55-u:7_107: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:7_110: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya ity api na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:7_111: tasya khalu punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_113: 229a] sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ na abhyavakāśasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_115: tat kasya hetor? abhadatvād acalatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya avikalpatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya.
S06adsp55-u:7_116: evam eva bhagavan (AdSPG I 55) bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_117: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe.
S06adsp55-u:7_118: tat kasya hetor? avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_119: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_120: māyā me dūre, māyākāro me 'bhyāśe, yaḥ punar ayaṃ janakāyaḥ sannipatita,
S06adsp55-u:7_121: eṣa me dūre vā 'bhyāśe vā. tat kasya hetor? avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya.
S06adsp55-u:7_122: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_123: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe.
S06adsp55-u:7_124: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na pratibimbasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_125: yena āraṃbaṇena pratibimbam utpannaṃ tat mama abhyāśe,
S06adsp55-u:7_126: ye punar atra upasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te me dūre.
S06adsp55-u:7_127: tat kasya hetor? avikalpatvād bhagavan pratibimbasya.
S06adsp55-u:7_128: evam eva bhagavam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_129: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:7_131: tat kasya hetor? avikalpatvāt punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā.
S06adsp55-u:7_132: na hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ priyo vā apriyo vā asti.
S06adsp55-u:7_133: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate,
S06adsp55-u:7_134: yasya priyo vā apriyo vā bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:7_135: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate,
S06adsp55-u:7_136: evam eva bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate.
S06adsp55-u:7_137: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:7_138: evam eva bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā (AdSPG I 56) sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇā,
S06adsp55-u:7_139: avikalpatām upadāya. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na tathāgatanirmitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_140: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:7_142: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya tathāgatanirmitasya ca.
S06adsp55-u:7_143: evam eva bhagavan na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:7_144: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:7_146: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmimīta sa yasya kāryasya kṛte nirmitas tat kāryaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:7_148: evam eva bhagavan yasya kāryasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kāryaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:7_150: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevasinā vā yantraṃ yuktaṃ syāt strivigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā,
S06adsp55-u:7_151: hastivigraho vā, balīvardavigraho vā. tac ca yadṛśasya kāryasya kṛte kṛtaṃ tat kāryaṃ karoti.
S06adsp55-u:7_152: tac ca yantram avikalpaṃ, evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate,
S06adsp55-u:7_153: tat kāryaṃ karoti. sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā.
S06adsp55-u:7_154: athāyuṣmāñc chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:7_155: [f. 229b] kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāiva avikalpā utāho dhyānapāramitā api,
S06adsp55-u:7_156: yāvad dānapāramitā apy avikalpā? subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_159_0: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte rūpam apy avikalpaṃ yāvad vijñānam apy avikalpaṃ? cakṣur apy avikalpaṃ yāvad mano 'py avikalpaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:7_159_1: kiṃ punar rūpam apy avikalpaṃ (AdSPG I 57) yāvad dharmam apy avikalpaṃ? cakṣurvijñānam
S06adsp55-u:7_160_0: apy avikalpaṃ yāvad manovijñānam apy avikalpaṃ? cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'py avikalpo yāvan manaḥsaṃparśo 'py avikalpaḥ? cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā
S06adsp55-u:7_160_1: api vedanā avikalpā yāvan manahsaṃsparśajā api vedanā avikalpāḥ? kiṃ punar dhyānāny apramāṇāny ārūpyasamāpattayo 'py avikalpā?
S06adsp55-u:7_160_2: smṛtyupasthānāny api yāvan mārgo 'pi śūnyatā ānimittam apraṇihitam apy avikalpaṃ? kiṃ punar daśatathāgatabalāni.
S06adsp55-u:7_161_0: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā apy avikalpāḥ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddharmā apy avikalpā
S06adsp55-u:7_161_1: bodhir apy avikalpā saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃkṛtadhātur apy avikalpāḥ? subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_163: āha: yady āyuṣmaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā apy avikalpāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:7_164: kuto 'yaṃ paṃcagatikaḥ saṃsāra iti bheda āgataḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:7_165: kuta iyaṃ prabhāvanā śrotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ? subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_166: ye te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra sattvā viparyāsasamutthitaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
S06adsp55-u:7_168: cchandamūlakaṃ karmavipākaṃ parigṛhya vikalpasamutthitaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyagatīr abhinirvartayanti.
S06adsp55-u:7_169: yat punar āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra evam āha:
S06adsp55-u:7_170: kutaḥ punaḥ śrotaāpannā prabhāvyante sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā,
S06adsp55-u:7_172_0: kutas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyanta iti? avikalpataḥ āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra śrotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante
S06adsp55-u:7_172_1: (AdSPG I 58) avikalpataḥ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad avikalpato 'rhantaḥ avikalpato 'rhatvaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:7_175: ye 'pi te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:7_176: te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīnāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:7_178_0: ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyutpanne 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:7_178_1: abhisaṃbuddhās te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīṇāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:7_179: tad anena te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:7_180: sarvadharmā avikalpā avikalpatathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya bhūtakoṭitathatān dharmadhātutathatāṃ pramāṇikṛtya.
