S06adsp55-u:7_181: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:7_182: avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann avikalpān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_0: atha āyuṣmañc charadvatīputra ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_1: sāre vatāyam [f. 230a] āyuṣmaṃ subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:9_3: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_4: asāre vatāyaṃ caraty āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:9_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra asārikā prajñāpāramitā yāvad asārikā sarvākārajñatā.
S06adsp55-u:9_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asāram eva nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_10: atha saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhūn:
S06adsp55-u:9_11: namaskaraṇīyās te kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpāditaṃ ye ceha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp55-u:9_12: atra ca arthe caranti. na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_13: yāṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭheran.
S06adsp55-u:9_14: anena api paryāyeṇa namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_15: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_16: nedaṃ devaputrā duṣkaraṃ (AdSPG I 60) bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti yaya sākṣātkṛyayā śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭherann.
S06adsp55-u:9_17: idaṃ teṣāṃ devaputrā duṣkarataraṃ yad aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti sannāhaṃ sannahyanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_18: te ca sattvā atyantatayā nopalabhyante yāṃ parinirvāpayeyuḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_19: evaṃ cāran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye sarvasattvān vineṣyāmi iti.
S06adsp55-u:9_22: tat kasya hetor? ākāśaviviktatayā sattvaviviktatā draṣṭavyā,
S06adsp55-u:9_26: anena api devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye avidyamānānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_27: ākāśena te sārdhaṃ vivaditukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_28: sa ca sannāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sannaddhas te ca sattvā nopalabhyante yeṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sannāhaḥ sannaddhas.
S06adsp55-u:9_29: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvaviviktatayā sannāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā.
S06adsp55-u:9_30: saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06adsp55-u:9_36: sacet punaḥ (AdSPG I 61) subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate na cāsya mānasaṃ saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:9_38: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_39: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na [f.
S06adsp55-u:9_41: asattvād bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:9_42: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavaṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:9_43: anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:9_44: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa bhagavaṃ nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yatra vā saṃsīdet.
S06adsp55-u:9_46: saced bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati.
S06adsp55-u:9_47: na līyate na avalīyate na saṃlīyate,
S06adsp55-u:9_48: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_49: carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante yo vā saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yatra vā saṃsīdet.
S06adsp55-u:9_50: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sendrakair devāiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair namasyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_51: bhagavān āha: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair namasyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_52: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:9_53_0: ye 'pi te abhikrāntā abhikrāntavarṇāḥ śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalāḥ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:9_53_1: (AdSPG I 62) mahāsattvaṃ namasyaṃti ya evaṃ prajñāparamitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:9_54: ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyāprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti,
S06adsp55-u:9_55: te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_56: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_58: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_60: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyur,
S06adsp55-u:9_61: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvanto mārān pāpīyāṃso 'bhinirmimīta,
S06adsp55-u:9_62: te sarve apratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaṃ kartuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:9_63: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_64: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ? sarvadharmaś ca anena sūnyatā vyavalokitā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_66: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo māhasattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_68: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_69: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ? yathāvādī ca bhavati tathākārī,
S06adsp55-u:9_71: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_72: evaṃ (AdSPG I 63) carantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06adsp55-u:9_74: utsāhaṃ ca dāsyanti: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhim anuprāpsyasi.
S06adsp55-u:9_75: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta śūnyatāvihāreṇa animittavihāreṇa apraṇihitavihāreṇa.
S06adsp55-u:9_76_0: [f. 231a] tat kasya hetor? anena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasy aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:9_76_1: śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy atrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ trāṇāṃ bhaviṣyasy aparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy alayanānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:9_76_2: layanaṃ bhaviṣyasy advīpānāṃ sattvānāṃ dvīpo bhaviṣyasy andhabhūtānāṃ sattvānām ālokabhūto bhaviṣyasi iti.
S06adsp55-u:9_77_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy anena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye 'pi te aprameyāsaṃkheyeyeṣu
S06adsp55-u:9_77_1: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhaṃti dhṛyaṃte yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayaṃti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:9_77_2: caraty ebhir guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitāguṇais tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā
S06adsp55-u:9_78: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte aham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06adsp55-u:9_79: sikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06adsp55-u:9_80_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ (AdSPG I 64) samyaksaṃbuddhasya antike brahmacaryaṃ caranty
S06adsp55-u:9_80_1: anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās teṣām apy ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy
S06adsp55-u:9_81: ye 'pi te pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhaṃti dhṛyaṃte yāpayaṃti dharmaṃ ca deśayaṃti,
S06adsp55-u:9_82: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_83: evaṃ ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayaṃti,
S06adsp55-u:9_84: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_85: ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayaṃti,
S06adsp55-u:9_87: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_88: tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:9_90: āha: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpāś te buddhā bhagavaṃto dharman deśayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_92: asti subhūte [f. 231b] bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avaivartikā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_93: asty avyākṛtakā bodhisattvā (AdSPG I 65) mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_94: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_95: āha: te punar bhagavaṃ katame? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:9_96: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃte 'nuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_97: ime te subhūte avaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_98: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_99: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_100: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:9_101: sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāyām adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:9_102: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:9_103: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:9_104: sarvadharmā riktakā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:9_105: eṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_106: yeṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_107: teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇāḥ śrāvakabhūmi pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca vyākṛyaṃte te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:9_108: yasya subhūte bodhisattvasya (AdSPG I 66) mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:9_111: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na kāṃkṣiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_113: evam etad yathā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti.
S06adsp55-u:9_114: sa punar eva vistareṇa śroṣyaty akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antikāt teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇām antikāt.
S06adsp55-u:9_116: imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitāṃ tathā adhimucyamāna avaivartikatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_117: evaṃ bahukaro hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā śravaḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyaṃte adhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti.
S06adsp55-u:9_118: tathātvāya pratipatsyante tathātvāya sthitvā tathātvāya pratipadya sthāsyanti sarvākārajñātāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:9_120: 232a] sthitvā yat pratipadya na kaścid dharmam upalapsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_121_0: kathaṃ sthāsyati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ? yad bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhyate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati
S06adsp55-u:9_121_1: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati? tathataiva
S06adsp55-u:9_121_2: tāvaṃ nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_122: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā (AdSPG I 67) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_124_0: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. bhagavān āha: yat subhūtir evam āha. na ca tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kiṃcid dharmam upalabhate yas tathatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:9_124_1: tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_127: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_130: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi.
S06adsp55-u:9_131: na subhūte tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:9_132: yas tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06adsp55-u:9_134: tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_136: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā.
S06adsp55-u:9_137: dharmatā sthita evaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_139: na tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_141: tat kasya ketoḥ? tathā hy atra tathatāyāṃ notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:9_142: tad yasya dharmasya nāpy utpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ (AdSPG I 68) na tatra kaścit sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_143: nāpi tatra sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:9_144: kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:9_145: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_146: gaṃbhīreyaṃ bhagavaṃ. prajñāpāramitā. duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:9_147: tat kasya hetor? na ca nāma bhagavaṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate nāpi kaścit tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati nāpi kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate nāpi kaścid dharman deśayati.
S06adsp55-u:9_148: tatra ca nāvalīyante na caiṣāṃ kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:9_149: atha subhūti sthaviraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:9_150: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām iha gaṃbhīreṣu dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhaṃdhāyitatvaṃ veti.
S06adsp55-u:9_151: śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu kasyātra kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati? śakra āha:
S06adsp55-u:9_153: tat sarvaṃ śūnyatām eva ārabhya nirdiśati.
S06adsp55-u:9_154: na kvacit sajjati. tadyathāpi nāma iṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjaty evam eva subhūte sthavirasya [f.
S06adsp55-u:11_0: atha śakro devanām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:11_1: kaceid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatām samyak vyākurvaṃ vyākaromi? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:11_2: sa khalu tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatāṃ vyākaroṣi.
S06adsp55-u:11_3: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad idaṃ subhūte sthavirasya pratibhāti.
S06adsp55-u:11_4: sarvaṃ taṃc chūnyatām evārabhya pratibhāty ānimittam eva apraṇihitam evārabhya pratibhāti.
S06adsp55-u:11_5: smṛtyupasthānāny evārabhya pratibhāti yāvan mārgam evārabhya pratibhāti.
S06adsp55-u:11_6: adhyātmaśūnyatām evārabhya pratibhāti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām evārabhya pratibhāti.
S06adsp55-u:11_8: bhagavān āha: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthavira śūnyatayā viharan dānapāramitām eva nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:11_9: kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:11_11: kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:11_12: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām eva nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:11_13: kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.

S06adsp55-u:14_90_0: dharman deśayanti. [f. 235a] ye 'pi te anantātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:14_90_1: śikṣitvā parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca parinirvāpayiṣyanti ca.
S06adsp55-u:14_91_0: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvavakabhūmim ārabhya dharman deśayes tayā ca dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06adsp55-u:14_91_1: lokadhātau sattvās te sarve arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:14_92: sacet me (AdSPG I 79) tvam ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaikapadam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayeḥ,
S06adsp55-u:14_93: evam ahaṃ tvayā me? śrāvakeṇa ārādhito bhaveyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:14_95_0: yā ca paurvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nupūrvacaramam arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryus
S06adsp55-u:14_95_1: teṣāṃ ca arhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu.
S06adsp55-u:14_96: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api nu tad bahu bhavet? āha:
S06adsp55-u:14_97_0: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:14_97_1: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam api,
S06adsp55-u:14_98: tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasaḥ saced ānanda ardhadivasam api,
S06adsp55-u:14_101: saced yāvan nāḍikāntaraṃ vā saced yāvad acchaṭāntaraṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:14_102: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:14_103_0: ayam eva ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveti yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ
S06adsp55-u:14_103_1: dharman deśayet sa sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati.
S06adsp55-u:14_104_0: sacet punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayet antaśa
S06adsp55-u:14_104_1: ekadivasam apy ardhadivasam api purobhaktam api nāḍikāntaram api kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:14_105: ayam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati.
S06adsp55-u:14_106_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa (AdSPG I 80) ātmanā ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ paraṃ ca anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06adsp55-u:14_107: evam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu,
S06adsp55-u:14_108: yāvan mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃ kuśalamulair vivardhamānaḥ asthānam ānanda anavakāśo yad anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ parihīyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp55-u:15_0_0: asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:15_0_1: tathā sthitānām eva puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena sarve
S06adsp55-u:15_0_2: te akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharman deśayantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:15_1: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ [f.
S06adsp55-u:15_2_0: 235b] kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:15_3_0: atha bhagavān punar eva tam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratisaṃhṛtavān pratisaṃhṛte ca tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre tāś catasraḥ parṣado
S06adsp55-u:15_3_1: na bhūyaḥ paśyanti tam akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:15_5: tac ca (AdSPG I 81) buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na bhūyaḥ paśyanti,
S06adsp55-u:15_6: na bhūyo buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaś cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati.
S06adsp55-u:15_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāras.
S06adsp55-u:15_8: tena tena bhūyaḥ paśyanti. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
S06adsp55-u:15_9: paśyasi tvam ānanda tad akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ ca akṣobhyam tathāgataṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghaṃ ca? āha:
S06adsp55-u:15_10: cakṣuṣo 'pi bhagavaṃs tad buddhakṣetraṃ nābhāsam āgacchati.
S06adsp55-u:15_11: nāpi sa tathāgato nāpi sa bhikṣusaṃgho nāpi sa bodhisattvasaṃghaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:15_12: bhagavān āha: evam eva ānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti.
S06adsp55-u:15_14_0: na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. yathā punar eva akṣobhyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas te ca śrāvakās
S06adsp55-u:15_14_1: te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalās tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati.
S06adsp55-u:15_15: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti.
S06adsp55-u:15_17: na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. sarvadharmā hy ānanda ajānakāḥ apaśyakāḥ akriyāsamarthāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:15_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? nirīhakā agrāhyā hy ānanda sarvadharmā ākaśanirīhakatayā,
S06adsp55-u:15_22: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś (AdSPG I 82) carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na ca kiṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:15_23: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:15_24: sarvapāramitāḥ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:15_25: eṣā śikṣā agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate anuttarā niruttarā ākhyāyate,
S06adsp55-u:15_28: yatra sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinābhyutkṣipya punar eva nikṣipeyuḥ na ca teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ bhaved,
S06adsp55-u:15_29: utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur nikṣipto vā.
S06adsp55-u:15_30: tat kasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣv asaṃgaṃ jñānadarśanam utpannaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:15_31: yāvantya ānanda śikṣā sarvāsāṃ śikṣāṇām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā pravarā ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:15_33: ākāśasya sa ānanda [f. 236a] pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vodgrahītavyaṃ manyeta.
S06adsp55-u:15_34: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vodgrahītavyaṃ manyeta.
S06adsp55-u:15_35: tat kasya hetoḥ? apramāṇā hy ānanda prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:15_36: na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇam ākhyātaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:15_37: nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyā hy ānanda pramāṇabaddhā na prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā.
S06adsp55-u:15_38: ānanda āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā apramāṇabaddhā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:15_41: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvitā.
S06adsp55-u:15_43: ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvayiṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:15_45: ye pi 'te ānandaitarhi daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpāyanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06adsp55-u:15_46: te 'pi buddha bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣiyate.
S06adsp55-u:15_47: tat kasya hetor? ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta.
S06adsp55-u:15_48: na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate.
S06adsp55-u:15_49: evaṃ na dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate.
S06adsp55-u:15_51: yeṣām utpādo nāsti kutas teṣāṃ kṣayaḥ prajñāsyate? atha bhagavān jihvendriyam abhinirmāpayya sarvāntaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇa saṃcchādya āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
S06adsp55-u:15_52_0: tasmād tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇa cakṣīthā deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ prajñapayeḥ prasthāpayeḥ
S06adsp55-u:15_52_1: vivarer vivarer uttānīkuryād vistareṇa (AdSPG I 84) saṃprakāśayeḥ.
S06adsp55-u:15_53: iha hy ānanda gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattsayānikair
S06adsp55-u:15_54: vā pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ. yatra yathānuśiṣṭā śikṣamāṇā svasu svasu bhūmiṣu sthāsyaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:15_55: iyaṃ punar ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarāṇāṃ praveśaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:15_56: iyam ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ yatra dhāraṇīmukhe bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:15_57: imān dhāraṇīn dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ sarvapratibhānapratisaṃvida āmukhībhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:15_58: iyam ānanda prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām akṣayaḥ saddharmakośaḥ ukto mayā.
S06adsp55-u:15_59: tasmāt tarhy ānanda ārocayāmi te prativedayāmi te ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:15_60: paryavāpṣyati. so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:15_61: [f. 236b] iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā.
S06adsp55-u:15_62: yān tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīn dhārayan sarvadharmān dhārayiṣyasi.
S06adsp55-u:17_2: yannv ahaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛccheyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:17_5: bhagavān āha: ākāśa akṣayatvāt subhūte akṣayā prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:17_6: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_10: yāvat sarvākārajñatā akṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_11: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_12: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_19: punar aparaṃ subhūte avidyākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_20: saṃskārākāśāakṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā (AdSPG I 86) abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_21: vijñānākaśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_22: nāmarūpākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_23: ṣaḍāyatanākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_24: sparśākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_26: tṛṣṇākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_27: upādānākāśāakṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_28: bhavākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_29: jātyākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_31: 237a] abhinirhartavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_33: āveṇiko 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇnasya yadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati.
S06adsp55-u:17_35: ya kaścit subhūte anena ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati.
S06adsp55-u:17_36: sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau (AdSPG I 87) vā sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:17_38: ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante,
S06adsp55-u:17_39: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikārān anāgamya vivartante.
S06adsp55-u:17_40: na ca jānaṃti kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:17_41: ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante sarve te idam upāyakauśalam anāgamya vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe.
S06adsp55-u:17_42: ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na vivartante 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe.
S06adsp55-u:17_43: upāyakauśalena caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā vyavalokitavyā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:17_44: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ paśyaty ahetukam utpadyamānam na kaṃcid dharmaṃ nityaṃ samanupaśyati na nirudhyamānaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:17_46_0: na sattvato na jīvato na jaṃtuto na manujato na mānavato na poṣato na pudgalato na kārakato na kārāpakato na utthāpakato
S06adsp55-u:17_46_1: na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedayitrīkato na jānakato na paśyakataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:17_47: na nityataḥ samanupaśyati na anityato na sukhato na duḥkhato na ātmato na anātmato na śāntato na aśāntataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:17_48: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā.
S06adsp55-u:17_49: yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva (AdSPG I 88) prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:17_51: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmānaṃ vā anātmānaṃ vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatām na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:17_52: ātmānaṃ vā anātmānaṃ vā, śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā. yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:17_53: tasmim [f. 237b] samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:17_64: yena ca dharmeṇa sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ kuryāt tam api na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:17_65: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:17_67: yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharma anupalabhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati
S06adsp55-u:17_68: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ chokaśalyasamarpito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_69: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitroḥ kālagatayo śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_71: evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvadharma anupalabhamānasya śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_73: subhūtir āha: kim eka eva bhagavaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃ parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_74: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātu mārā pāpiyāṃsas (AdSPG I 89) te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpitā bhavaṃti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_75: ye 'pi te subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:17_77: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_78: evaṃ viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate gādhaṃ na labhate.
S06adsp55-u:17_79: yatra gṛhītvā vivartayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:17_80: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_83: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:17_85: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06adsp55-u:17_87: prajñāpāramitā kathaṃ bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_88: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānaṃ dadan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tad dānaṃ dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:17_89: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_90: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā [f.
S06adsp55-u:17_91: 238a] bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlaṃ rakṣan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tac chīlaṃ rakṣati.
S06adsp55-u:17_92: evaṃ (AdSPG I 90) khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_93: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāṃtyā saṃpādayaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:17_95: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_96_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:17_96_1: vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tad vīryam ārabhate.
S06adsp55-u:17_97: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_98_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06adsp55-u:17_98_1: dhyānāni samāpadyamānaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tāni dhyānāni samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:17_99: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_100_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:17_100_1: prajñāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati.
S06adsp55-u:17_101: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:17_103: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_104_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ
S06adsp55-u:17_104_1: vākkarma maitraṃ (AdSPG I 91) manaskarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_105: śīlapāramitāṃ tasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:17_106: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_107_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā ākrośaṃti vā paribhāṣanti vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir
S06adsp55-u:17_107_1: vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti sa na teṣām antike cittam āghātayati.
S06adsp55-u:17_108: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:17_109: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyaṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_110_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā akrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir
S06adsp55-u:17_110_1: vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti tasyākruśyamānasya vā paribhāṣyamānasya vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaryamāṇasya vā dānabuddhir
S06adsp55-u:17_111: dānaṃ na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:17_112: sa kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayati.
S06adsp55-u:17_113: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:17_114: 238b] parigṛhṇāti. āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān aha:
S06adsp55-u:17_115: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
S06adsp55-u:17_116: anyatra sarvākārajñātāyām eva asya cittaṃ na pravartate.
S06adsp55-u:17_117: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (AdSPG I 92) dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:17_118: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo upāyakauśalena dānan dadan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:17_119: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānaṃ parityajato māyābuddhir sadā dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:17_120: tena ca dānena na kasyacid sattvasya upakāraṃ vā apakaraṃ vā paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:17_121: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthita.
S06adsp55-u:19_1: kathaṃ bhagavān bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_2: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yaḥ kāyiko vā vāciko vā caitasiko vā saṃcaras tena saṃcareṇa śrāvakabhūmiṃ.
S06adsp55-u:19_4: sa tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyavaropayati nādattam ādadāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_5: na kāmeṣu mithyācarati na mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp55-u:19_6: na piśunāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na paruṣāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati, na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_7_0: na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati. sa tatra śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthakebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthakebhyo yānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_7_1: yānārthakebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthakebhyaḥ puṣpāṇi puṣpārthakebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthakebhyo gandhān gandhārthakebhyo vilepanāṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_7_2: vilepanārthakebhyaḥ śayanāsanaṃ śayanāsanārthakebhyaḥ upāśrayam upāśrayārthakebhyaḥ prājīvikaṃ prājīvikārthakebhyaḥ upakaraṇam
S06adsp55-u:19_7_3: upakaranārthakebhyaḥ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_8: tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_9: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā pariṇāmo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (AdSPG I 94) śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇati.
S06adsp55-u:19_11: aha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_12_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sacet sarvasattvāgamyāṃgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā cchittvā
S06adsp55-u:19_12_1: gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi na kṣubhyati na vyāpadyate anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:19_13: sulabdhā me lābhā yatra hi nāma mama sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā cchittvā gacchanti.
S06adsp55-u:19_16: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:19_17: 239a] parigṛhṇāti. āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_18: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kāyena ca cittena ca vīryaṃ na sraṃsayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_19: sarvasattvā mayā uttārayitavyā saṃsārād amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:19_20: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_21: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_22: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_23: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ yāvan nirodhaṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_24: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmim adhyālambate.
S06adsp55-u:19_25: anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati. iha mayā samādhipāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 95) sthitvā sarvasattvā saṃsārāt parimocayitavyā iti.
S06adsp55-u:19_26: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:19_27: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_28: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlāpāramitāyāṃ sthito na kaṃcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati na asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_29: na bhāvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na abhāvam asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_32: na kasyacid dharmasya astitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_34: tayā ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalena ca na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati.
S06adsp55-u:19_35: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthita prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_36: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇātī? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_37_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānan dadato yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā
S06adsp55-u:19_37_1: ākrośeyuḥ paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā cchintyuś tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:19_38: dātavyam eva mayaitebhya sattvebhya na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:19_39: sa teṣāṃ sattvānām annam annārthikebhyo dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_40: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo dadāti. yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkārāṃ dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_41: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_42: yathā pariṇāmayatas triṣu buddhiṣu (AdSPG I 96) na pravartate.
S06adsp55-u:19_44: kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_45: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_46: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa na kaṃcit sattvaṃ jīvitād vyavaropayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_47: nādattam ādadāti na kāmeṣu mithyācarati na mṛṣāvadati na paiśunyaṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:19_48: 239b] vadati. na pāruṣyaṃ vadati. na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati. na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_49: na ca asya śrāvakabhūmau vā. pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ krāmati.
S06adsp55-u:19_50: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_51: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā trividhā buddhir na pravartate.
S06adsp55-u:19_53: kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_54: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_55: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito evaṃ vīryaṃ saṃjanayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_56_0: gatvāhaṃ yojanaśataṃ vā gatvā yāvad yojanasahasraṃ vā yāvad yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā yāval lokadhātuṃ vā gatvā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_56_1: vā gatvā tatra antataḥ ekasattvam api śaraṇagamane śikṣāpadeṣu vā pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ (AdSPG I 97) kṣāntau vā śrotaāpattiphale
S06adsp55-u:19_56_2: vā yāvad arhattve vā pratyekabodhau vā yāvad anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam iti vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ tāni ca
S06adsp55-u:19_56_3: kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_57: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_58: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_59_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_59_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_62: utpanno 'nutpannāṃś ca cittacaitasikān dharmān kuśalopasaṃhitān sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_63: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā dhyānāni ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmiṃ samaye nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:19_64: nevaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:19_65: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛḥṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_66: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣantipāramitāyāṃ sthito yasmiṃ samaye dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī viharati,
S06adsp55-u:19_67: viviktākāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vā akṣayākāreṇa vā,

S06adsp55-u:19_73: na parigṛhṇāti. āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo.

S06adsp55-u:19_78: na mayā na abhisaṃboddhavyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.

S06adsp55-u:19_80: lokadhātuṃ vā yāval lokadhātukoṭiṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'ntaśa ekasattvam api bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.

S06adsp55-u:19_90: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_92: prāṇātipātavairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti
S06adsp55-u:19_93: teṣām api ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:19_94: yāvad ātmanā ea mithyādṛṣṭeḥ (AdSPG I 99) prativirato bhavati paraṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_96: ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratās teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_97: samanujñaḥ. sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātau pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp55-u:19_100: nānyatra tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_101: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā asya trividhā buddhir na pravartate.
S06adsp55-u:19_103: kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_104: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_105_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sacet manuṣyabhūto vā amanuṣyabhūto
S06adsp55-u:19_105_1: vā cittavikṣepaṃ kuryāt aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā chittvā cchitvā ādāya gacchet tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_106: kaścit me chinnatti vā bhinnatti vā harati vā.
S06adsp55-u:19_107: api tv asyaivaṃ bhavati, sulabdhā [f. 240b] me lābhā yeṣām eva kṛte kāyaṃ pariharāmi.

S06adsp55-u:19_112: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_113: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pritisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_115: sa maitrīsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_116: evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatena upekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_118: sa teṣāṃ dhyānānāṃ ca apramāṇānāṃ ca ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:19_119: vipākaṃ na parigṛhṇāti. anyatra yatra sarvasattvānām arthaḥ kartavyas tatropapadyate.

S06adsp55-u:19_121: dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:19_122: buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlānām avaropanatāyai.
S06adsp55-u:19_123: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_124: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_125: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_126: na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. śīlapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_127: na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, kṣāntipāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:19_128: vīryapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati (AdSPG I 101) na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:19_129: dhyānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:19_130: evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāni yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:19_131: na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. sa sarvadharmān adravyataḥ samanupaśyann abhāvataḥ animittataḥ samanupaśyan,
S06adsp55-u:19_134: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.

S06adsp55-u:19_136: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akusalair dharmai savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.

S06adsp55-u:19_144: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvākabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_145: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_146: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthita śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_147: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya na rāgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate na doṣasahagataṃ na mohasahagataṃ,

S06adsp55-u:19_150: tāni ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_151: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_152: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_153: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ pratyavekṣate.

S06adsp55-u:19_158: kasya vā kāyaḥ kasya vā vedanā kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā kasya vā saṃskārā kasya vā vijñānaṃ? tasyaivaṃ pratyevekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati.

S06adsp55-u:19_160: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:

S06adsp55-u:19_171: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropayan sattvān paripāvayan buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayaṃs.

S06adsp55-u:19_174: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_175: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito rūpaṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:19_177: dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:19_179: ṛddhipādāṃ nopalabhate indriyāṇi nopalabhate balāni nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:19_180: bodhyaṃgāni nopalabhate. āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ (AdSPG I 104) nopalabhate,

S06adsp55-u:19_185_1: dharmasthititā sthita eva dharmadhātu sa naivotpadyate na nirudhyate.

S06adsp55-u:19_188: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_189: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti

S06adsp55-u:19_191: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatām adhyātmaśūnyateti nopalabhate.

S06adsp55-u:19_207: śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā.

S06adsp55-u:19_212: asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā.

S06adsp55-u:19_213_1: pariṣkarāṃs tad dānaṃ śūnyam iti na samanupaśyati.

S06adsp55-u:19_217_0: prathamacittotpādam upādāya. yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya. yathaiva tathāgatasya arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:19_217_1: abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vā āgrahacittaṃ vā utpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:19_218: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na mātsaryacittaṃ vā āgrahacittaṃ vā utpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_219: eṣa eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śāstā yaduta prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:19_220: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_221: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_222: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ (AdSPG I 106) śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittānām avakāśaṃ na dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_223: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrāvākapratyekabuddhabhūmīṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:19_224: tac ca cittaṃ nopalabhate. yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayet.
S06adsp55-u:19_226: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaṃ prāṇātipātaṃ prahāṇāya dharman deśayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_230: ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavaṃti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_231: samanujñaḥ. yāvad ātmanā ca mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_232: paraṃ ca mityādṛṣṭivairamaṇye samādāpayati mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp55-u:19_233: ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭiviratās teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:19_234: tena ca śīlena na kaṃcid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati.
S06adsp55-u:19_235: śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā buddhatvaṃ vā prāg eva anye kecit.
S06adsp55-u:19_236: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāni parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_237: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_238: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya ānulomikī kṣāntir utpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_239: tasyaivaṃ bhavati. neha kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā.
S06adsp55-u:19_240: jāyate vā jīryate vā mṛyate vā,
S06adsp55-u:19_242_0: cchidyate vā bhidyate vā. [f. 242b] hanyate vā. tasya prathamacittopādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍam atrāntarāt sacet sarvasattvā
S06adsp55-u:19_242_1: āgamya ākrośeyu paribhāṣeral loṣṭadaṇḍa muṣṭiśastraprahārān dadyuś cchindyur bhidyur vā tatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:19_243: aho dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā (AdSPG I 107) na ca nāmeha kaścid dharma ākrośyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā badhyate vā.
S06adsp55-u:19_244: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_245: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_246: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitaḥ caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu
S06adsp55-u:19_247_0: sthita upāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayya lokadhātum api gatvā lokadhātuśatam api gatvā
S06adsp55-u:19_247_1: lokadhātusahasram api gatvā yāval lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_248: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vā vīryapāramitāyāṃ vā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:19_251: sakṛdāgāmīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_252: tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. yathā na saṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:19_254: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:19_255: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:19_256_0: iha subhūte hodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathāgatasamādhiṃ sthāpayitvā yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhayo
S06adsp55-u:19_256_1: vā pratyekabuddhasamādhayo vā bodhisattvasamādhayo vā tān sarvān samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_257: tatra samādhiṣu sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca.
S06adsp55-u:19_258: katamān aṣṭau? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_259: ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirddhārūpāṇi paśyaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_261_0: śubhaṃ cādhimukto bhavaty, ayaṃ tritīyo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām
S06adsp55-u:19_261_1: amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānāntyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_262: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānāntyāyatana samatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānanantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_263: ayaṃ paṃcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_264: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:19_265: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham [f.
S06adsp55-u:19_266: 243a] upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. imān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca.
S06adsp55-u:19_267: nava ca anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca.
S06adsp55-u:19_268_0: katamā nava? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ
S06adsp55-u:19_268_1: vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_271: iha nava anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca.
S06adsp55-u:19_272: sa eṣām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇām āsāṃ ca navānām anupūrvasamāpattīnāṃ vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛṃbhitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_273_0: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (AdSPG I 109) siṃhavijṛṃbhitaḥ samādhiḥ? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06adsp55-u:19_273_1: viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
S06adsp55-u:19_277: sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛṃbhitaṃ samādhiṃ vipākīkṛtya viṣkandakasamādhiṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_278_0: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viṣkandakasamādhi? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair
S06adsp55-u:19_278_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmai savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_279: prathamadhyānād vyutthāya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_281: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_283: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya tritīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_285: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:19_298: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya. asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate. asamahitacittān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_301: ākiṃcanyāyatanād vyutthāya. asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate. asamahitacittād vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:19_313: sa iha avaskandakasamādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:19_314: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:21_0: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:21_1: kiyac ciraṃ saṃprasthito vatāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_2: asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_3: āha: kiyanto buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito 'yaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_4: gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_5: āha: kin tena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśalamūlam avaropitama yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_6: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_7: na sā kācic chīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_8: āha: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_9_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āścaryam etad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_9_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryacandramaṇḍalaṃ caturo (AdSPG I 112) dvīpān avabhāsayati,
S06adsp55-u:21_11: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti,
S06adsp55-u:21_15: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06adsp55-u:21_16: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvān na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06adsp55-u:21_17: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakaiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_18: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt pañcapāramitāḥ sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_19: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ sarvasannāhasannaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durādharṣo bhavati pratirājānair vā pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā,
S06adsp55-u:21_20: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitā avirahitatvād durādharṣā bhavanti māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir,
S06adsp55-u:21_23: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñā cakravartinā anuvidheyā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_25: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tena anugacchanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_26: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī tena anugacchanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_27: (AdSPG I 113) tā gaṅgānadyā sārdhaṃ mahāsamudram upayānti,
S06adsp55-u:21_28: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ yena sarvākārajñatā tena anugacchanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_29: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇahastaḥ sarvakṛtyāṇi karoty,
S06adsp55-u:21_32: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yat kunadīṣu yac ca mahānadīṣu udakaṃ sarvaṃ tan mahāsamudram anupraviṣṭam ekarasaṃ bhavaty,
S06adsp55-u:21_33: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06adsp55-u:21_34: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñāś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasya cakraratnam agrato gacchati,
S06adsp55-u:21_35: tiṣṭhati ca. yatra rājā cakravarty annahetos tiṣṭhati,
S06adsp55-u:21_37: na ca tac cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
S06adsp55-u:21_38: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā,
S06adsp55-u:21_40: tatra sthāsyanti, tatra sthitvā tataḥ sthānato nātikrāmanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_41_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś tac cakraratnaṃ tac ca pariṇāyakaratnaṃ tac ca gṛhapatiratnaṃ tac ca strīratnaṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_41_1: tac ca maṇiratnaṃ tac ca hastiratnaṃ tac ca aśvaratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya agrato gacchaty,
S06adsp55-u:21_42: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agrato gacchaty,
S06adsp55-u:21_43: agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati,
S06adsp55-u:21_45: dānapāramitā mama [f. 243b] anugacchet. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā anugacchet.
S06adsp55-u:21_48: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryaparamitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā (AdSPG I 114) evaṃ bhavaty:
S06adsp55-u:21_50: tat kasya hetoḥ? svabhāvo hy āsām eṣaḥ akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaśūnyā tucchā marīcisamā.
S06adsp55-u:21_53_0: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carañc chīlapāramitāyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_53_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_54: iha subhūte bodisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭpāramitāsu carataḥ evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:21_56: sa na śakyam anupāyakauśalena saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_57: ahaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya dānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_59: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carisyāmi. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. sa teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya ādhyatmikabahyāni vastūni parityajati,
S06adsp55-u:21_61: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy etad vastu svabhāvaśūnyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_62: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_63: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlasya avakāśaṃ na dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:21_64: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:21_65: naitad me pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kuryāṃ yāvan mithyādṛṣṭiko bhaveyaṃ viṣayān vā prārthayeyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_66: devatvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ vā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā prārthayeyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_67: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 115) mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_68: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya satatam ākruśyamānaḥ paribhāṣyamāṇaḥ kaṭukaiḥ karkaśair vacanair na kṣobhacittam utpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_69: nāpi loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrapāṣāṇaprahārais tāḍyamāno nāpi śārirā vayaveṣu bhidyamāneṣu nāpy aṅgapratyaṅgāvayaveṣu cchidyamāneṣu duṣṭacittam utpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_70: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvaśaṃ tāṃ pratiśrutkropamān upaparīkṣate.
S06adsp55-u:21_71: rūpaṃ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ yāvat vijñānaṃ māyopamam upaparīkṣate.
S06adsp55-u:21_72: [f. 244a] evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:21_73: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na kausīdyacittam utpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_74: sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭyāṃ yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_75: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:21_76: na kusīdena śakyaṃ sattvānām arthaḥ kartum anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_77: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_78: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na vikṣiptacitto bhavati yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_79: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_80: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāvirahito bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_81: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāpy anyathā śakyaṃ sattvān paripācayitum anyatra prajñāpāramitāpraveśāt,
S06adsp55-u:21_82: tasmāt mayaikam api dauṣprajñasahagataṃ (AdSPG I 116) cittaṃ notpādayitavyam iti.
S06adsp55-u:21_83: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām evārthāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_84: āha: yadi bhagavan pāramitānāṃ nāsti nānātvaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_85: kutaḥ iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_86: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na subhūte pāramitānāṃ kiṃcin nānātvāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_87: yadi punaḥ prajñāpāramitā na bhaven nemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran,
S06adsp55-u:21_88: prajñāpāramitāṃ punar āgamya imāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06adsp55-u:21_89: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam upasaṃkrāntā ekavarṇā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_90: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamyemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā ekavarṇā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_91: yaduta prajñāpāramitāvarṇā, na viśeṣaḥ kaścit prajñāyate iyan dānapāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_92: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:21_94: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:21_95: kuta iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānām agryākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_96: jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_98: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:21_99: api tu khalu lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñāyate śīlapāramitā (AdSPG I 117) kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_101: sarve te ca sattvā na jāyaṃte na mṛyaṃte na cyavyaṃte nopapadyante.
S06adsp55-u:21_103: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agryākhyāte jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_106: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yā kāścana striyas tāṣāṃ striratnānām agramā ākhyāyate yāvad asamasamākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_107: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agryākhyāyate yāvad asamasamā ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_108: āha: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agryā ākhyāyate yāvad asamasamākhyāyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_109: tathā hi iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvakuśaladharmān parigṛhya yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena.
S06adsp55-u:21_110: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_111: no hīdaṃ subhūte na prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_112: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte.
S06adsp55-u:21_114: āha: katamān bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṃ na gṛhṇāti na muṃcati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_115: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06adsp55-u:21_116: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
S06adsp55-u:21_117: yāvad bodhiṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06adsp55-u:21_118: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:21_120: kathaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā aparigṛhītā bhavati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_121: rūpasya subhūte amanasikārato rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:21_122: vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya amanasikārato vijñānam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:21_123: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā amanasikārato bodhir aparigṛhītā bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_124: evaṃ khalu subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_126: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā,
S06adsp55-u:21_127: tat kathaṃ bhagavann amanasikurvato rūpaṃ yāvad amanasikurvataḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06adsp55-u:21_129: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir aparipūryamāṇābhiḥ kathaṃ sarvākārajñatā anuprāpsyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_130: yadā subhūte rūpaṃ na manasikariṣyati vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ na manasikariṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:21_131: yāvad bodhiṃ na manasikariṣyati tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlaṃ vivardhiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:21_132: kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati ṣaṭpāramitā paripūrya sarvākārajñām anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_133: tat kasya heto? amanasikṛtya rūpam amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam amanasikṛtya bodhim anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_134: āha: kim atra bhagavaṃ kāraṇāṃ yad amanasikṛtya rūpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_135: amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñā saṃskāravijñānaṃ amanasikṛtya bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_136: amanasikāreṇa na śleṣyate, kāmadhātau na ślesyate rūpadhātau na śleṣyate arūpyadhātau amanasikāreṇa na kvacic cchliṣyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_137: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na (AdSPG I 119) kvacid dharmeṣu śleṣṭavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_139: 245a] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kva sthāsyati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_140: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na sthāsyati vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na sthāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_142: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃs tatra api sarvākārajñātāyān na sthāsyati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_144: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra abhiniviśed avatiṣṭhed vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_145: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśena asthānayogena.
S06adsp55-u:21_147: ya evaṃ carati evaṃ bhāvayati sa prajñāpārmitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:21_149: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_154: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_156: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatra abhiniviśeta.
S06adsp55-u:21_157: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānāti cyavate bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_158: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś cyavate sa sarvadharmebhyaś cyavate.
S06adsp55-u:21_159: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati prajñāpāramitā paṃcapāramitān (AdSPG I 120) parigṛhṇāti yavat sarvākārajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:21_161: na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihīnena śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_163: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthita vyākariṣyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_164: na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyuto vyākriyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp55-u:21_166: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitām abhinirharati yāvat mahākaruṇām abhinirharati.
S06adsp55-u:21_168: tat kasya heto? na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyutasya śakyaṃ dānapāramitām abhinirhartuṃ yāvan na śakyaṃ mahākaruṇām abhinirhartuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_170: parigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmā svayam abhisaṃbudhya ākhyātā.
S06adsp55-u:21_171: deśitā prakāśitā cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_172: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi tathāgatena kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_173: tat kasya heto? tathā hi subhūte tathāgata na kaṃcid dharmaṃ prajñapayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_174: kutaḥ puna kiṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbhotsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_175: atha khalv āyuṣmāṃs subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:21_176: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ime doṣāḥ na bhavanti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_177: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānāty asaṃtaḥ sarvadharmā aparigṛhītā aśakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_178: saced (AdSPG I 121) evaṃ carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_179: sacet punar evam aparigṛhītaṃ dharmam abhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:21_181: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā abhiniveśato vaktavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_182_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyā avirahitā yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā
S06adsp55-u:21_182_1: sarvākārajñatayā avirahitā? sacet prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_183: yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā avirahitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_185: kathaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā abhinirhṛyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_186: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti na abhiniviśate idaṃ rūpam asya rūpam iti.
S06adsp55-u:21_187: evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam iti na abhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:21_189: yāvat sarvākārajñateti na abhiniviśate idaṃ sarvākārajñatā asya sarvākārajñateti.
S06adsp55-u:21_190: rūpaṃ nityato vā anityato vā na abhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_191: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ nityato vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_192: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_193: rūpaṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_194: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_195: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_196: rūpam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:21_197: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_198: yāvat sarvākārajñatām ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_199: rūpaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_200: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_201: yāvat sarvākārajnatāṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_202: rūpaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_203: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_204: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ (AdSPG I 122) śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_205: rūpaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_206: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_207: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_208: rūpaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_209: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_210: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_211: rūpaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:21_212: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_213: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_214_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy asvabhāvo dharmo nitya iti vā anitya iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti va ātma iti vā anātma iti vā
S06adsp55-u:21_214_1: śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti
S06adsp55-u:21_214_2: vā vivikta iti vā avivikta iti vā śakyam abhinirhartuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_215: svabhāvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyam iti na śakyam abhinirhartuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_216: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_217: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_218: 246a] sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṃgo balakāyo.
S06adsp55-u:21_221: evam eva subhūte yena yenaiva prajñāpāramitā gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:21_224: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sārathiś caturyugamaś (AdSPG I 123) ca ratham abhiruhya samena mārgeṇa gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:21_225: evam eva āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathī.
S06adsp55-u:21_226: samena mārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tena gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:21_227: āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ katamaḥ amārgaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_231: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ ayam amārgaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_232: āha: mahākṛtyena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā yaivaṃ praṇayaty ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārgaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_233: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. mahākṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yā mārgaṃ vā amārgaṃ vā pradarśayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_236: prajñāparamitā subhūte tac ca kṛtyam varṇayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_237: na ca rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti na śrāvakatvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya parigrahāya pratyupasthitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_238: sā khalu punar iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikā anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ śrāvakabhūmeś (AdSPG I 124) ca pratyekabuddhabhūmeś ca apariṇāyikā,
S06adsp55-u:21_239: sarvākārajñatāyāś ca upanāyikā evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
S06adsp55-u:21_240: āha: yadi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī,
S06adsp55-u:21_241_0: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ kathaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kathaṃ kṣāntir
S06adsp55-u:21_241_1: bhāvayitavyāḥ kathaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ kathaṃ dhyānāni samāpattavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:21_243_0: sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dānan dātavyāṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya sīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbanīkṛtya
S06adsp55-u:21_243_1: kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dhyānāni samāpattavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:21_245: tena tāni kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:21_246_0: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_248: yaś ca kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāya avirahitaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_249: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_250: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvakuśalamūlāni paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_251: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_252: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu (AdSPG I 125) yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_253: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_255: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāra vijñānaṃ sa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā.
S06adsp55-u:21_256: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_257: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_258: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthāsyāmi iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_259: yāvan na sarvākārajñatā yāṃ sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_260: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi rūpaṃ kvacit sthitaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_261: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ kvacit sthitaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_263: evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarā samyakambodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā.
