S06adsp55-u:21_264: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khāditukāmo bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:21_265: tena āmraphalaṃ vā panasaphalaṃ vā avaropitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_266: avaropya kālena kālam udakaṃ dātavyaṃ kelayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_267: tasya anupūrveṇa vardhamāne staṃbhe sāmagrīm āsādya āmraphalair vā panasaphalair vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_268: sa tāny āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khādiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_269_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā sattvān
S06adsp55-u:21_269_1: dānena anugrahītavyā śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñayā anugrahītavyāḥ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayitavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_270_0: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣīditukāmena
S06adsp55-u:21_270_1: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena (AdSPG I 126) ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_271: āha: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_272: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_273: sarvadharmavaśitābhāvanām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_274: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_279: śrāvākayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_280: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_282: 247a] dhyānapāramitayāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_283: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_284: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durādharṣo bhavati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_285: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_286: taṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_287_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan buddhā bhagavan (AdSPG I 127) tas taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06adsp55-u:21_287_1: kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti? katham
S06adsp55-u:21_287_2: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti? yāvat kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06adsp55-u:21_288: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_289: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_290: tathā punaḥ samanvāharanti yathā naiva dānaṃ na śīlaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vīryaṃ na dhyānaṃ na prajñām upalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:21_292: evaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_296: punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na rūpataḥ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_297: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato na vijñanataḥ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_299: āha: bahuṣu bhagavaṃs sthāneṣu bodhisattyena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_301: evam etat subhūte evam etad. bahuṣu sthāneṣu bodhisattvena manāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_302: na kvacic chikṣitavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante,
S06adsp55-u:21_304: āha: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgateneme dharmā saṃkṣipteṇa ca vistareṇa ca bhāṣitās,
S06adsp55-u:21_305_0: (AdSPG I 128) tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena
S06adsp55-u:21_305_1: ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyā paryavāpya vācā suparicitāḥ kṛtvā manasā anuprekṣitavyās,
S06adsp55-u:21_306: tathā ca anuprekṣitavyā yathā cittacaitasikadharmā na pravarteran.
S06adsp55-u:21_307: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āsu saṃkṣiptavistareṇa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_309: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_310: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskarāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā tathatāṃ jānānaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_313: āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ rūpasya tathatā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_314: yasyā tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_315: iyaṃ rūpatathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_316: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskarāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_317: yasyā tathatāyā notpāda prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvan prajñāyate iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatātathatā.
S06adsp55-u:21_319: bhūtakoṭiṃ jānānaḥ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_320: āha: katamā sā bhagavaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_321: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir. atra koṭyāṃ (AdSPG I 129) śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_322: dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_323: āha: katamāsau bhagavaṃ dharmadhātuḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_324: adhātur dharmadhātuḥ, yasya dharmadhātor nocchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_325: evaṃ caraṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_326: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñātavyaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_327: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_328: āha: katame te bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ? bhagavān ahā:
S06adsp55-u:21_329: rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃskṛtadhātur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_330: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy asya svabhāvo 'sti yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā visaṃyujyeta vā,
S06adsp55-u:21_332: yaś ca abhāvaḥ sa abhāvena sārddhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_333: evaṃ sarvadharmā jñātavyāḥ. ayaṃ punaḥ suhhūte abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_334: atra hi subhūte 'bhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_335: yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitvā ihaiva abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_336: iha punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_337: āha: tīkṣṇendriyasya bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_338: mṛdvendriyasya api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśo,
S06adsp55-u:21_339: madhyendriyasya (AdSPG I 130) api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ asamāhitendriyasya api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_340: na ayaṃ kasyacid yan na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:21_341: na kusīdasya ayaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya na muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasya,
S06adsp55-u:21_343: śikṣitukāmasya avaivartikabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_344: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānāpāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_345: 248a] kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_346: tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicin mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06adsp55-u:21_348: tasmād upāyakauśalaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_349: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_350: tasmiṃ samaye asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti saddharmaṃ deśayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:21_352: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavaṃta.
S06adsp55-u:21_353: yaduta ṣaṭpāramitebhyaḥ. tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṃkṣitavyam aham apy etān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_355: anuprāpsyante ca. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena (AdSPG I 131) mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata yogaṃ āpattavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_356: evaṃ yujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_357: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_358: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyām antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_359: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_360_0: na tv eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvās tān dānena saṃtarpayet śīle pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06adsp55-u:21_360_1: prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet śrotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed yāvad
S06adsp55-u:21_361: ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām acchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api bhāvayet.
S06adsp55-u:21_362: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātaṃ hi tad dānaśīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanasrotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_363: ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te 'py ato niryātāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_364: ye 'pi te 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'py ata eva prabhāvitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_365: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte yo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ va saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_366: kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyāny api kalpaśatāni imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāraṃbaṇamanasikārair bhāvayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_368_0: na tv eva ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān sarvān dānena saṃtarpayet śīle pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau prajñāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_368_1: vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet srotaāpattiphale yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau (AdSPG I 132) pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06adsp55-u:21_370: 248b] hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair etad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñāptaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ prajñaptaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ prajñaptā.
S06adsp55-u:21_372: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartika pratikāṇkṣitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_373_0: tathāgatasamanvāgata sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ bahubuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_373_1: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_376: caturdaśaśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ yāvat catuḥpratisaṃvidabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_380: buddhadarśana avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_381: kuśalamūla avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_382: buddhakṣetra avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_387: saṃcintya bhavapratikāṃkṣī (AdSPG I 133) sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ akṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_388: anakṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ bodhisattvavihārakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_391: nekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalo bahvādhivacanakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_392: stryadhivacanukuśalo puruṣādhivacanakuśalo napuṃsakādhivacanakuśalo sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_394: rūpakuśalo vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalaḥ vijñānakuśalaḥ yāvat nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalaksaṇakuśalaḥ asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_398_0: 249a] dharmadhātukuśalo dharmaniyāmatākuśalaḥ hetupratyayakuśalaḥ apratyayakuśalaḥ skandhakuśalo dhātukuśalaḥ āyatanakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_1: satyakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ dhyānakuśalaḥ apramāṇakuśalaḥ ārūpyasamāpattikuśalaḥ ṣaṭpāramitākuśalaḥ (AdSPG I 134)
S06adsp55-u:21_398_2: catusmṛtyupasthānakuśalo yāvat sarvakārajñātākuśalaḥ saṃskṛtadhātukuśalaḥ asaṃskṛtadhātukuśalaḥ dhātukuśalaḥ adhātukuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_3: rūpamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat sarvākārajñatāmanasikārakuśalaḥ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa sūnyam iti kuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_4: yāvat vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvad bodhi bodhyā śūnyeti kuśalaḥ praśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ apraśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_5: utpādanirodhakuśalaḥ sthitvanyathātvakuśalaḥ rāgakuśalaḥ dveṣakuśalo mohakuśalaḥ arāgakuśalaḥ adveṣakuśalaḥ amohakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_6: dṛṣṭikuśalaḥ adṛṣṭikuśalaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ amithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalaḥ nāmakuśalo nāmarūpakuśalaḥ āraṃbaṇakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_7: adhipatikuśalaḥ ākārakuśalaḥ lakṣaṇakuśalaḥ duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalaḥ nirodhakuśalaḥ mārgakuśalaḥ narakakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalo
S06adsp55-u:21_398_8: yamalokakuśalaḥ manuṣyakuśalaḥ manuṣyamārgakuśalaḥ devakuśalo devamārgakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalamārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_398_9: sakṛdāgāmīkuśalaḥ sakṛdāgāmīphalamārgakuśalaḥ anāgāmīphalamārgakuśalaḥ arhattvakuśalaḥ arhattvamārgakuśalaḥ pratyekabodhikuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_399_0: sarvākārajñatākuśalaḥ sarvākārajñatāmārgakuśalaḥ indriyakuśalaḥ indriyaparipūrikuśalaḥ āśuprajñakuśalaḥ tīkṣṇaprajñakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_399_1: javanaprajñakuśalaḥ nairvedhikaprajñakuśalaḥ pṛthuprajñakuśalaḥ asamaprajñakuśalaḥ atītādhvakuśalo 'nāgatādhvakuśalaḥ pratyutpannādhvakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_399_2: upāyākuśalaḥ sattvāśayakuśalaḥ āśayakuśalaḥ adhyāśayakuśalaḥ (AdSPG I 135) arthakuśalo vyañjanakuśalaḥ yānatrayāvasthānakusalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_400: ete 'nuśāṃsāḥ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_401: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_402: rūpaśāntatayā rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchakatayā rūpāsārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_406: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyeti? ākāśaśūnyatābhinirhareṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_407: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti? [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_409: āha: kiyac ciraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇāṃ bhavati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_410: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_412: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs cittānantaryatāvirahitena bhavitavyaṃ? bhagavān āha;
S06adsp55-u:21_413: anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_414: sarvākārajñatāmanasikāram anutsṛjatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_415: tathā punaś caritavyaṃ tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ tathā abhinirhartavyā yathā cittacaitasikā dharmā na pravartante.
S06adsp55-u:21_416: āha; kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitām abhinirharatā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā sarvākārajñatā anuprāpyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_417: no hi iti. āha: tat kim (AdSPG I 136) abhāvayatā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_418: no hīti. āha: tat kiṃ bhāvayatā ca abhāvayatā ca? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_419: no hīti. āha: tat kiṃ naiva bhāvayatā nā bhāvayatā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_420: no hīti. āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_421: yathā tathatā. āha: kathaṃ tathatā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_422: yathā bhūtakoṭi. āha: kathaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_423: yathā dharmadhātuḥ. āha: kathaṃ dharmadhātuḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_425: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātu? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_426: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_427: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jivaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:21_428: katham ātmadhātuṃ sattvadhātum jīvadhātuṃ pudgaladhātuṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ? evam aprajñapayan prajñāpāramitām evaṃ aprajñapayaṃ sarvadharmān sarvākārajñātam anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:21_429: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_430: aprajñapanīyā dhyānapāramitā aprajñapanīyā vīryapāramitā aprajñapanīyā kṣāntipāramitā aprajñapanīyā śīlapāramitā aprajñapanīyā dānapāramitā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_431: aprajñapanīyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā aprajñapanīyā yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_432: āha: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyā sarvadharmā kutaḥ punar bhagavan narakāḥ prajñāyante.
S06adsp55-u:21_434: devā vā manuṣyā vā prajñāyante śrotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā (AdSPG I 137) samyaksaṃbuddho vā prajñāyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_435: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_436: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvān kuto narakaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:21_437_0: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devān vā manuṣyan vā śrotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vā anāgāminaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_437_1: vā samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vā prajñapayiṣyāmi? evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā aprajñapanīyeṣu
S06adsp55-u:21_438: āha: na punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_439: 250a] yāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_441: vedanāyāṃ saṃjnāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā.
S06adsp55-u:21_443: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpe śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā.
S06adsp55-u:21_444: kathaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu kathaṃ vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā? bhagavān āha;
S06adsp55-u:21_446: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_448: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anutpādānirodhatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_449: anabhisaṃskāratāyāṃ, saṃskārāṇāṃ na bhāvanāyāṃ na vibhāvanāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_450: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anabhisaṃskāratāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? bhagavān āha;
S06adsp55-u:21_451: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ sarvadharmāṃ paśyatā (AdSPG I 138) anabhisaṃskāratāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_452: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā sarvadharmā draṣṭavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_455: saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā saṃskārā saṃskarai śūnyā draṣṭavyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ cakṣuś caksūṣā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_456_0: yāvat mano manasā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā
S06adsp55-u:21_456_1: śūnyā draṣṭavyā dhyānāni dhyānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:21_457: yāvan nirodhasamāpattir nirodhasamāpattyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā smṛtyūpasthānāni smṛtyupasthānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_458: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_459: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataś caryā bhavati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_461: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavann acaryā prajñāpāramitācaryā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_462: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhisattvo 'pi nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_463: caryā api nopalabhyate. yaś carati yena vā carati yatra vā carati tad api nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_464: iyaṃ subhūte acaryā bodhisattvasya māhasattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā yatraite sarvaprapaṃcā nopalabhyante.
S06adsp55-u:21_465: āha: yadi bhagavann acaryā prajñāpāramitācaryā tat katham ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_466: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam evārabhya anupalaṃbheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_467: tena dānaṃ dadatā anupalaṃbhayogena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_468: śīlaṃ rakṣatā anupalaṃbhayogena śīlaṃ (AdSPG I 139) rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayatā anupalaṃbhayogena kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_470: samādhiṃ samāpadyamānena anupalaṃbhayogena samādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayatā.
S06adsp55-u:21_471: anupalaṃbhayogena [f. 250b] prajñā bhāvayitavyā. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayatā anupalaṃbhayogena sarvākārajñatā bhāvayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_475: advayam anupalaṃbha. āha: kim iti bhagavan dvayaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_476: yāvat cakṣūrūpāṇi yāvad yāvan manodharmāś ca yāvad yāvad bodhir buddhāś ca idaṃ subhūte dvayaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_477: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ atha anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbha? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_479: na anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalaṃbha anupalaṃbhasamatā anupalaṃbhaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_480: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upalaṃbhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_481: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyām anaupalaṃbhiko bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_482: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalaṃbhe sajjate naivānupalaṃbhe,
S06adsp55-u:21_483: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_484: bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrya sarvākārajñatā anuprāptavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_485: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalaṃbhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_486: na hy upalaṃbhe sthitvā śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmi paripūrayituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_487: tat kasya heto? anupalaṃbho hi prajñāpāramitā anupalaṃbho bodhi so 'pi nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_489: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 140) caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_490: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhir api nopalabhyate yo 'pi bodhau carati so 'pi nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_491_0: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sarvadharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_491_1: vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad iyaṃ bodhiḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_492: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti.
S06adsp55-u:21_493: yathā kurvan rūpam upalabheta vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam upalabheta.
S06adsp55-u:21_494: yāvad bodhim upalabheta. āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:21_496: yāvad bodhiṃ nopalabhate, katham idānīṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ kṣantipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati.
S06adsp55-u:21_502: buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_503: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_504: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya kṛte yāvan na bodheḥ [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_506: āha: kasya bhagavan kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (AdSPG I 141) prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavan āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_508: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_512: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛta anabhisaṃskṛtayogena.
S06adsp55-u:21_513: āha: yadi bhagavann akṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmā,
S06adsp55-u:21_514: tat katham eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_515: śrāvākayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_516: na subhūte akṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_518: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjano 'bhiniviśya pañcasu skandheṣu rūpe yāvad vijñāne.
S06adsp55-u:21_519: yāvat sarvākārajñātāyām abhiniviśya rūpaṃ manyate rūpam upalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:21_522: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty: ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye ahaṃ sattvān mocayiṣye saṃsārāt sa evam asat kalpayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_523: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte yad buddhaiḥ paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ yāvad bodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_524: tat te mohapuruṣā andhā acakṣuṣkā sattvāṃc chinnanti saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_525: āha: yadi bhagavaṃs tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabhdāḥ sattvā ye saṃsārāt parimucyeran,
S06adsp55-u:21_526: katham idānīṃ bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃs tṛṣu rāśiṣu vyākarṣīt,
S06adsp55-u:21_528: (AdSPG I 142) na me subhūte anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kaścit sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_529: samyaktvaniyato vā aniyato vā mithyātvaniyato vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_530: api tu khalu subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñina.
S06adsp55-u:21_531: abhūtagrāhād vārayāmi, lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06adsp55-u:21_532: āha: nanu bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_533: neti. āha: tad viparyāse sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_534_0: neti. āha: tad yadi bhagavan nāpi paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā nāpi viparyāse sthitvā tan mā
S06adsp55-u:21_534_1: haiva na tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:21_535: bhagavān āha: abhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_536: sā na kvacit sthitvā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau.
S06adsp55-u:21_537: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātau vā asaṃskṛte vā dhātau.
S06adsp55-u:21_538: sa tathāgatanirmito gacchati ca āgacchati ca,
S06adsp55-u:21_539: tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca, sa dānapāramitāyāṃ carec chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S06adsp55-u:21_540: yāvac catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya viharet catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattī.
S06adsp55-u:21_541: pañcābhijñā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayed yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_542_0: 251b] mārgaṃ śūnyatāṃ samādhim ānimittaṃ samādhim apraṇihitaṃ samādhim adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣān
S06adsp55-u:21_542_1: navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni catvān vaiśāradyāni catasra pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām (AdSPG I 143)
S06adsp55-u:21_543: sa ca nirmitaḥ apy apramāṇān sattvān nirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt,
S06adsp55-u:21_544: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. api nu tena nirmitena kaścit sattvo vyākṛto bhavet? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_545: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena nirmitopamā sarvadharmā jñātā gaṇitā ajñānanirmitāṃ jñātvā na kaścit sattva upalabdho nāpi vinītaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_546: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_549: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_550: tathāgatasya subhūte nirmitasya ca na kiṃcid viśeṣo na kiṃcin nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_551: nirviśeṣo hi subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca.
S06adsp55-u:21_552: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti.
S06adsp55-u:21_553: taṃ nirmitaḥ karma karoti. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti? bhagavān āha;
S06adsp55-u:21_554: karoti subhūte. āha: atha kathaṃ punar bhagavann asati tathāgate nirmita karma karoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_555: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śāntamatis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvam anupalabhamānas tathāgatavigrahaṃ nirmāya parinirvṛta,
S06adsp55-u:21_556: tena ca nirmitenordhvaṃ kalpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_557: sa ca paścād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vyākṛtya parinirvṛta iti saṃjñātaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_558: na ca nirmitasya kaścid utpādo na parinirvāṇaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_559: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yaduta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya.
S06adsp55-u:21_560: nirmitasya ca tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:21_562: ya ime bhagavaṃ sattvā puṇyārthikā nirvānārthikās tathāgate 'rhe samyaksaṃbuddhe dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_563: na ca jātu sā kṣīyate yāvan na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_565: na jātu kṣīyate yāvan na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_566: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgata sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ tathaiva dharmatayā nirmitaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_569: ye 'pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tathā tathāgataṃ maitrāvatā manasikāreṇa manasikariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_570: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:21_572: ye pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ākāśe puṣpaṃ kṣepsyanti tathāgataṃ manasikṛtya,
S06adsp55-u:21_573: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam anadhigamya,
S06adsp55-u:21_574: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu subhūte maitrāvān manasikāraḥ tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_575: ye kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā buddhaṃ namaskariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_577: evaṃ mahārthikā vata subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā.
S06adsp55-u:21_578: evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā. tad anena paryāyeṇa subhūte veditavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_579: , tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca nāsti kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_580: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya (AdSPG I 145) evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_582: sā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_583: iyan dhyāna pāramitā, iyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_584: yāvat iyan dānapāramitā iyan dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_586: āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06adsp55-u:21_587: tad yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitam idaṃ rūpam yāvad idaṃ vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_589: evaṃ kuśalā akuśalāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ laukikā lokottarāḥ sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_590: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_591: no hīdaṃ subhūte. nāmanimittaiś ca mayā te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ dharmāṇāṃ sūcanā kṛtā,
S06adsp55-u:21_592: kathaṃ paro 'vataret iti. na punar dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_593: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmani mittaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ pareṣām avataraṇārthaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_594: tat kathaṃ bhagavann anāmakā animittā dharmā nāmanimittena vyāhṛtāḥ bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_595: vyāhāraḥ subhūte na nāmanimittaṃ na abhiniveśo vā,
S06adsp55-u:21_596: nānyatra subhūte duḥkham eva vyāharāmi na nāmni na nimitte vā abhiniveśe.
S06adsp55-u:21_597: na hi subhūte tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmanimitte (AdSPG I 146) 'bhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_607: abhiniviśeta tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmanimitte.
S06adsp55-u:21_610: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmanimittamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_611: tatra ca na abhiniveṣṭavyaṃ. āha: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_612: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam
S06adsp55-u:21_613: utpādayati, bodhaye cittaṃ utpādya anekavidhān saṃskārāviprakārān pratyanubhavati.
S06adsp55-u:21_614: bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati. bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran vicitrāṇi dānāni dadāti.
S06adsp55-u:21_615: śīlañ ca rakṣati kṣāntyā ca saṃpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_616: vīryaṃ ca ārabhate. samādhiṃ ca samāpadyate. prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati. śūnyatāyāṃ ca carati. dhyānāpramāṇaiś ca arūpyasamāpattibhiś ca carati.
S06adsp55-u:21_617: smṛtyupaṣṭhānaiś ca viharati samyakprahāṇaiś ca viharati.
S06adsp55-u:21_619: daśabhiś ca tathāgatabalair viharati yāvan mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca paripūrayati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_620: yat subhūtir evam āha: yadi nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_621: tat kasya idāniṃ kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati? yasmāt (AdSPG I 147) tarhi subhūte nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_622: tac ca nāma nāmnā [f. 252b] śūnyaṃ, nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:21_624: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:21_625: tasya ca nāmanimittasya notpādo na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_628: āha: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
S06adsp55-u:21_632: ko viśeṣa kin nānākaraṇaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_633: sarvajñatā subhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgākārajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_634: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ sarvajñatā śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_636: kena kāraṇena sarvākārajñatā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_637: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad eva adhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmāḥ te śrāvakapratyekabuddhair api jñātā na punaḥ sarvamārgāṇi na sarvākāreṇa.
S06adsp55-u:21_638: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha: kena kāraṇena mārgākārajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iti? sarvamārgāḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenautpādayitavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_639: sarvamārgāḥ jñātavyā, (AdSPG I 148) ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgā.
S06adsp55-u:21_640: ye ca bodhisattvamārgāḥ, te ca mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:21_643: āha: yat punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyo nanu tena bhūtakoṭi na? sākṣātkartavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_644: na apariśodhya subhūte buddhakṣetraṃ na aparipācya sattvāṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_645: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_646: neti. āha: tad amārge sthitvā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_647: neti. āha: tan mārge ca amārge ca sthitvā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_648: neti. āha: tan naiva mārge na amārge sthitvā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_649: neti. āha: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_650: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte mārge te sthitasya anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_651: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: amārge sthitasya? āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha: tan mārge ca amārge sthitasya? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_652: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavan āha: tan naiva mārge na amārge sthitasya anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ? āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_653: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. na me bhagavaṃ kvacit sthitasya anupādāyāsravebhyas cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_654: vimuktaṃ ca me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitasya.
S06adsp55-u:21_655: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:21_656: yat punaḥ subhūte sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatety (AdSPG I 149) ucyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_658: yaduta śāntākāreṇa. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_659: 253a] dharmā sūcyante, sarvāṇi tāny ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatena anubuddhāni,
S06adsp55-u:21_661: āha: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatā ca mārgākārajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca,
S06adsp55-u:21_662: kaccid bhagavann āsām tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06adsp55-u:21_663: asya sāvaśeṣaprahāṇam asya anavaśeṣaprahāṇam iti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_665: asti punas tathāgatasya sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ na punaḥ srāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya ca sarvāsanānusandhikleśaprahānaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_666: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann ebhir anuprāptam asaṃskṛtaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_667: kiṃ vā punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_668: neti. āha: yady asaṃskṛtasya nānātvaṃ nopalabhyate,
S06adsp55-u:21_670: asya sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇam asya na sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ? bhāgavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_672: api tv asti teṣāṃ śrāvākapratyekabuddhānāṃ rāgadoṣamohaprahāṇaṃ kaścit tu kāyavikārās pravartante te bālapṛthagjanānām anarthāya sanivartante.
S06adsp55-u:21_673: na tu śrāvakānāṃ te tathāgatasya nāsti.
S06adsp55-u:21_675: yady abhāvo (AdSPG I 150) bhagavaṃ mārgaḥ abhāvo nirvāṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:21_678: ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_680: yaś ca śrotaāpanno yaś ca sakṛdāgāmī yaś ca anāgāmī yaś ca arhan yaś ca pratyekabuddho yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaś ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_681_0: āha: kaccit punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtaṃ prabhāvayaty ayaṃ śrotaāpanno 'yaṃ yāvad arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:21_681_1: mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_682: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ prabhāvayaty api tu khalu vacanaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya jalpyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_684: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti tatra vākpathaprajñaptir.
S06adsp55-u:21_685: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan paścimā koṭir prajñapyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_686: lokavyavahāraṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya yair yair antaḥ ucchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiḥ prajñapyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_687: api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭir prajñaptā.
S06adsp55-u:21_688: āha: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ punaḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:21_689: kutaḥ punaḥ paścimā koṭiḥ prajñāyate? bhagavan āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_690: evam etat subhūte evam etat. svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvakoṭir na prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:21_691: kutaḥ punaḥ paścimā koṭiḥ prajñapyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_692: api tu khalu subhūte ye te sattvā svalakṣaṇaśunyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_693: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ sā pūrvakoṭir iyaṃ sā paścimā koṭir iti,
S06adsp55-u:21_694: na punaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu (AdSPG I 151) pūrvakoṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_695: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_696: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu caran na kvacid abhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:21_697: adhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā, saṃskṛteṣu vā asaṃskṛteṣu vā,
S06adsp55-u:21_699: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:21_704: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā [f.
S06adsp55-u:21_705: 253b] bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā tathāgatāś ca arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā pāraṃ gatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:21_707: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ abhinnaḥ sa.
S06adsp55-u:21_708: iha prajñāpāramitayāḥ taiś ca tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu pāro nopalabdhas,
S06adsp55-u:21_710: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatā antargatā bhūtakoṭir antargatā dharmadhātur antargatās,
S06adsp55-u:21_712: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vā anidarśanā vā pratighā vā apratighā vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_713: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā arūpiṇy anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā.
S06adsp55-u:21_714: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ (AdSPG I 152) cārikā,
S06adsp55-u:21_715_0: dātrī sarvapratibhānānāṃ sarvālokānānām anacchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā asaṃhāryā mārair vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ
S06adsp55-u:21_715_1: śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikair vā pudgalair yāvan na kaiścid anyatīrthikaiḥ pāpamitrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyam ācchetuṃ
S06adsp55-u:21_716: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te sarve 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya.
S06adsp55-u:21_717: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_718: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caratā anityārthe caritavyaṃ duḥkhārthe anātmārthe caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_720: kṣayajñānārthe. anutpādajñānārthe. dharmajñānārthe. anvayajñānārthe. saṃvṛtijnānārthe, paramārthajñānārthe. yāvad yathāvajjñānārthe caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_721: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyārthe caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_722: āha: yadi bhagavann iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś ca anarthaś ca nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_724: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gaṃbhīre prajñāpāramitārthe caratā evaṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_725_0: rāgo me 'rtho 'nartha iti na varitavyaṃ dośo me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ moho me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭir
S06adsp55-u:21_725_1: me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ yāvat sarvadṛṣṭigatāni me (AdSPG I 153) 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_726: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi rāgadoṣamohānāṃ tathatā yāvan na nānādṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp55-u:21_727: rūpaṃ me artha iti na caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_729: vijñānaṃ me artha iti na caritavyaṃ vijñānaṃ me 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_730: yāvad: bodhi me 'rtha iti na caritavyaṃ bodhi me 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_731: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na kaścid dharmo upalabdho yo 'rthaṃ vā kuryād anarthaṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:21_732: api tu khalu subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā sthitaiva dharmadhātu.
S06adsp55-u:21_733: sa naiva kasyacid arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_734: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena artha anarthān varjitena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:21_735: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ karoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_736: tathā hi subhūte saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtadharmatā yāś ca karaṇīyā prajñāpāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:21_739: āha: nanu bhagavann asaṃskṛto 'rtha sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_740: asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ subhūte sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca? na punar kasyacid upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:21_741: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya tathatā na kasyacid upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā,
S06adsp55-u:21_742: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā (AdSPG I 154) na kasyacid dharmasya upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā.
S06adsp55-u:21_743: āha: nanu bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_744: evam etat subhūte evam etat. bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ iha gaṃbhīrāyām asaṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
S06adsp55-u:21_745: na punar dvayayogena. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann advayo dharma advayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_746: neti. āha: tat kiṃ dvayo dharma dvayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_747: neti. āha: tat kiṃ dvayo dharma advayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_748: neti. āha: tat kim advayo dharma dvayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_749: neti. āha: tat katham idānīṃ prāpyate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:21_750: yadā na dvayan dharmo nādvayan dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:21_751: tat kasya hetoḥ? anupalaṃbho hi prāpti sā na anupalaṃbhena prāpyate na punar upalaṃbhena prāpyate.
S06adsp55-u:23_1_0: gaṃbhīrā bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante
S06adsp55-u:23_1_1: na ca nāma kaścit sattva upalabhyate na ca sattvaprajñaptis,
S06adsp55-u:23_2: te ca sattvānāṃ kṛte anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante.
S06adsp55-u:23_3: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśa apratiṣṭhāne stambam icched vāpayitum evam eva bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛte sarvākārajñatām icchanty anuprāptuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_4: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye sattvānāṃ kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante.
S06adsp55-u:23_5: tāṃ ca sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃ sattvagrāhāt parimocayanti.
S06adsp55-u:23_6: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ stambam icched vāpayituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_7: sa ca puruṣas tasya stambasya na mūlaṃ jānīyān) na śākhān na gaṇḍaṃ na pattrān na puṣpaṃ na phalaṃ jānīyāt,
S06adsp55-u:23_8_0: sa tasya stambasya gaṇḍaṃ vāpayitvā kālena kālaṃ gopayet udakaṃ dadyāt tasya sa gaṇḍam anupūrveṇa śākhāsaṃpannaś ca bhavet
S06adsp55-u:23_8_1: pattrasaṃpannaś ca bhavet puṣpasaṃpannaś ca (AdSPG I 156) bhavet phalasaṃpannaś ca bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:23_9: sa tasya stambasya pattrāṇi ca anubhuṃjīta puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca anubhuṃjīta.
S06adsp55-u:23_10: evam eva subhūte ye bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante te 'nupūrveṇa ṣaṭpāramitāsu caraṃtaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti.
S06adsp55-u:23_12: tatredaṃ subhūte pattraṃ yad bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvāḥ tribhyo apāyebhyaḥ [f.
S06adsp55-u:23_13_0: 254b] parimucyante. puṣpaṃ yad bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāsālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāsālakuleṣu gṛhapatimahāsālakuleṣu
S06adsp55-u:23_13_1: upapadyante cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu upapadyante yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopageṣu deveṣu upapadyante.
S06adsp55-u:23_14: phalaṃ yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tāṃ sattvāṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati sakṛdāgāmīphale pratiṣṭhāpayati anāgāmīphale pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:23_16: tam eva bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
S06adsp55-u:23_17: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya te 'pi sarvasattvānāṃ pattrapuṣpaphalopajīvyā bhavaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:23_18: tatra ye dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaṃti te sarve 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
S06adsp55-u:23_19: yaduta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06adsp55-u:23_21: na sattvaprajñaptiṃ tāṃś ca sattvāṃ sattvagrāhāṃ parimocayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:23_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena (AdSPG I 157) prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_23: na ceha kaścit sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:23_25: subhūtir āha: tathāgata eva bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_26: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvanarakā ucchidyante,
S06adsp55-u:23_27_0: sarvatiryagyonaya sarvayamalokā ucchidyante sarvākṣaṇāpāyā ucchidyante sarvadāridryāny ucchidyante sarvahīnagataya ucchidyante
S06adsp55-u:23_27_1: sarvakāmadhātur ucchidyate sarvarūpadhātur ucchidyate sarva ārūpyadhātur ucchidyate.
S06adsp55-u:23_28: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_29: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nābhaviṣyan,
S06adsp55-u:23_30: nātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prajñāsyatan,
S06adsp55-u:23_31: na pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyan na arhatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyan na anāgāmināṃ na sakṛdāgāmināṃ na srotaāpannānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyat.
S06adsp55-u:23_32: na punar yāvat sarvanarakā udacchetsyaṃta na sarvatiryagyonayo na sarvayamalokā udacchetsyanta.
S06adsp55-u:23_33: na sarvakāmadhātur udacchetsy anta na sarvarūpadhātur udacchetsyanta na sarvārūpyadhātur udacchetsyanta.
S06adsp55-u:23_34: ... ... api tu khalu punar subhūte yad evaṃ vadasi,
S06adsp55-u:23_35: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavya iti.
S06adsp55-u:23_36: evam etat subhūte evam etat. tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ veditavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_37: tat kasya [f. 255a] hetoḥ? yayā subhūte tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate,
S06adsp55-u:23_40: yayā tathatayā rūpaṃ prajñapyate yayā tathatayā yāvad vijñānaṃ prajñapyate yayā tathatayā yāvat saṃskṛtadhātuḥ prajñapyate.
S06adsp55-u:23_41: asaṃskṛtadhātu prajñapyate. sarvā sā tathataiva, tasmāt tathatā ity ucyate. tasyāṃ tathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:23_42: tasmāt tathāgata ity ucyate. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eva veditavyaḥ tathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
S06adsp55-u:23_43: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_44: tathatāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:23_48: sarvadharmatathatāvaśībhāvanatām anuprāpya sarvasattvendriyakuśalo bhaviṣyati indriyakuśalo bhūtvā.
S06adsp55-u:23_53: tridhvasujñānaṃ viśodhya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:23_57: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvān triṣu yāneṣu (AdSPG I 159) pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:23_58: sattvān triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:23_59: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāṃ guṇānuśaṃsān paśyatā ātmanā ca anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_60: pare ca anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_61: subhūtir āha: namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭhāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp55-u:23_62: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena.
S06adsp55-u:23_63: ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭhāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp55-u:23_64: āha: kiyad bhagavaṃ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_65: sacet subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śrāvakabhūmau pratitiṣṭheyu pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratitiṣṭheyu.
S06adsp55-u:23_66: api nu te sattvā bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_67: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. aprameyaṃ bhagavann aprameyaṃ sugata.
S06adsp55-u:23_68: bhagavān āha: yac ca khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_69: yac ca prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_70: asya prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya puṇyasaṃbhārasya evaṃ (AdSPG I 160) trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā [f.
S06adsp55-u:23_72: yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06adsp55-u:23_73: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikā pudgalā na punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā.
S06adsp55-u:23_74: tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā,
S06adsp55-u:23_75_0: sacet ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śrāvakaguṇasamanvāgatā pratyekabuddhaguṇasamanvāgatā bhaveyus
S06adsp55-u:23_75_1: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti.
S06adsp55-u:23_78: tat kasya hetor? bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā.
S06adsp55-u:23_79_0: evaṃ saced ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śuklavidarśanābhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:23_79_1: tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06adsp55-u:23_80: sacet punaḥ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve gotrabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ,
S06adsp55-u:23_81: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06adsp55-u:23_83: darśanabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ tanubhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyu.
S06adsp55-u:23_84_0: vītarāgabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ kṛtāvībhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ (AdSPG I
S06adsp55-u:23_84_1: 161) teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpadikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm
S06adsp55-u:23_86: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śravakapratyekabuddhaguṇā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā.
S06adsp55-u:23_87: sacet punar ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā bhaveyus,
S06adsp55-u:23_88: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06adsp55-u:23_89_0: sacet punar ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhipratipannakā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tathāgatasya
S06adsp55-u:23_89_1: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti.
S06adsp55-u:23_91: āha: prathamacittotpādikena bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā manasikartavyā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_92: prathamacittotpādikena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārājñatā manasikartavyā.
S06adsp55-u:23_93: āha: sarvākārajñatāyā bhagavaṃ ko bhāva kim āraṃbaṇaṃ kim ādhipateyaṃ ka ākāra kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_96: yat punar subhūtir evam āha: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kim āraṃbaṇam iti? sarvākārajñatāyā kim ādhipateyaṃ ka ākāra kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti? sarvākārajñatāyā subhūte abhāva āraṃbaṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_98: śāntir ākāro, alakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ. sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte idam āraṃbaṇam idam ādhipateyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ayam ākāra.
S06adsp55-u:23_101: 256a] apy abhāvaḥ, evam ādhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ abhāvāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:23_102_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvārarddhipādā
S06adsp55-u:23_102_1: pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṇgo mārga śūnyatāsamādhiḥ ānimittasamādhiḥ apraṇihita samādhiḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ
S06adsp55-u:23_102_2: navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī
S06adsp55-u:23_102_3: mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā prathamābhijñā dvitīyābhijñā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamy abhijñā ṣaṣṭy abhijñā saṃskṛtadhātur
S06adsp55-u:23_103: rūpam api subhūte abhāva vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānam apy abhāvaḥ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur apy abhāvaḥ asaṃskṛtadhātur apy abhāvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_104: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatāyā svabhāvo nāsti.
S06adsp55-u:23_105: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte svabhāvo nāsti sa abhāvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_106: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā svabhāvo nāsti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_108: yasya sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvo nāsti sa abhāvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_110: api tu khalu punar subhūte śūnyatāsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ ānimittasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ apraṇihitasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā.
S06adsp55-u:23_111: api tu khalu subhūte. tathatāsvabhāvaḥ (AdSPG I 163) sarvadharmāḥ bhūtakoṭisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ dharmadhātusvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_112: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_114: tat katamenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
S06adsp55-u:23_115: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06adsp55-u:23_116: evaṃ prathame dhyāne caran yāvat caturthe dhyāne maitryāṃ yāvad upekṣāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_121: dhyāneṣu apramāṇeṣu yāvat navānupūrvasamāpattīṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu.
S06adsp55-u:23_123: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ (yāvat? ) sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06adsp55-u:23_124: bhagavān āha: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāyakauśalaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:23_126: buddhakṣetraṃ ca [f. 256b] pariśodhayati. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃś ca sattvān abhāvasvabhāvāṃ jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:23_127: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ (AdSPG I 164) karoti.
S06adsp55-u:23_133: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:23_135: sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃs tāvat tasmin bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti.
S06adsp55-u:23_136: yāvan na daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:23_138: na catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgato bhavati na āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgato bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:23_139: ayaṃ subhūte sa bodhimārgo yatra mārge sthitvā pāramitān paripūrayati.
S06adsp55-u:23_140: pāramitān paripūrya ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06adsp55-u:23_141: tasya tatra avasthāyāṃ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśan prahāsyati anutpattikaprahāṇena.
S06adsp55-u:23_142: sa buddhacakṣuṣā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vyavalokayann abhāva ity api na upalapsyate prāg eva bhāvaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_145: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāyakauśalaṃ yad abhāva iti nopalabhate prāg eva bhāvaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:23_146: sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ (AdSPG I 165) dadāti,
S06adsp55-u:23_147: sa tan dānan dadan na kalpayati,
S06adsp55-u:23_148: na nimittīkaroti naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti.
S06adsp55-u:23_150: na nimittīkaroti, naiva bhāvato nābhāvato manasikaroti.
S06adsp55-u:23_151: dāyakam api na kalpayati. na nimittīkaroti. naiva bhāvato nābhavato manasikaroti.
S06adsp55-u:23_153: na nimittīkaroti, nālambanīkaroti. na samanupaśyati ... yāvat ... prajñāpāramitāṃ na kalpayati,
S06adsp55-u:23_154: na nimittīkaroti, naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti.
S06adsp55-u:23_156: tam api na samanupaśyati na nimittīkaroti,
S06adsp55-u:23_158: yeṣām api sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ na kalpayati na nimittīkaroti,
S06adsp55-u:23_160: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi yadi ta eva sarvadharmā abhāvās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na śrāvakair na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā.
S06adsp55-u:23_162: nanu bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_163: evam etat subhūte evam etat. dharmair eva dharmā virahitā.
S06adsp55-u:23_164: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitās,
S06adsp55-u:23_165: tat kathaṃ virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānāti,
S06adsp55-u:23_166: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. na hi bhagavann abhāvo dharmo abhāvam dharmaṃ jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:23_169: na bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:23_170: evam asaṃjānaṃ sarvadharmeṣu kutaḥ evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:23_171: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_172: lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 166) caran bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
S06adsp55-u:23_173: na punaḥ paramārthena. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:23_174: na anya subhūte Iokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:23_176: 257a] tathatā, tat te sattvā viparyastā etāṃ tathatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti.
S06adsp55-u:23_177: teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśati,
S06adsp55-u:23_178: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcaskandheṣu bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ abhāva iti na jānanti.
S06adsp55-u:23_181: katham abhāva jānīyur iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:25_2: kasyaitad adhivacanaṃ yaduta bodhisattvacāriketi? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_3: bodhisattvacārikā bodhisattvacāriketi subhūte ucyate bodhaye esā cārikā tasmād bodhisattvacārikety ucyate.
S06adsp55-u:25_4: āha: kva bhagavaṃ sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cārikā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_5: rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_6: evam ādhyātmikabāhyair āyatanair dānapāramitāyāṃ carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:25_7_0: ādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. bahirddhāśūnyatāyām ādhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:25_7_1: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām atyaṃtaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:25_10: prathame dhyāne carati. dvitīye tṛtīye eaturthe dhyāne carati maitryāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_15: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu paṃcasv indriyeṣu.
S06adsp55-u:25_16: paṃcasu baleṣu. saptabodhyaṅgeṣv. āryāṣṭāṃge mārge carati. śūnyatāyāṃ samādhau caraty ānimitte samādhau ca apraṇihite samādhau carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_19: catasṛṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_21: sattvaparipāke carati. pratibhāne caraty akṣarābhinirhāreṣu carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_22: akṣarapraveśeṣu carati. anakṣarapraveśe carati. dhāranīṣu carati. saṃskṛtadhātau caraty. asaṃskṛtadhātau carati. tathā punar carati yathā buddhir na dvidhī bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:25_23: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhau carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_26: kasyaitad adhivacanaṃ buddha iti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_28: api tu khalu subhūte bhūto 'nena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhas,
S06adsp55-u:25_29: tasmād buddha ity ucyate. bhūto [f. 257b] 'nenārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate.
S06adsp55-u:25_30: api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmāḥ anena yathāvad abhisaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:25_31: tasmād buddha ity ucyate. āha: bodhi bodhir iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06adsp55-u:25_32: kasyaitad bhagavann adhivacanaṃ bodhir iti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_33: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:25_34: tathatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ, bhūtakoṭer etad adhivacanaṃ, dharmadhātor etad adhivacanaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:25_35: api tu khalu subhūte bodhir iti tathata avitathatā (AdSPG I 169) ananyatathatā ananyathābhāvas,
S06adsp55-u:25_36: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte nāmadheyanimittamātram etad yaduta bodhis,
S06adsp55-u:25_37: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:25_38: api tu khalu subhūte buddhānām eṣā bhagavatāṃ bodhis,
S06adsp55-u:25_39: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:25_40: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. āha: yo bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha bodhaye carati,
S06adsp55-u:25_41: sa kiṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ viharati,
S06adsp55-u:25_42: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ kuśalamūlānām ācayo bhavaty apacayo vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_43: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ iha bodhau carati ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati yāvat sarvākārajñatayā carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_44: tasya na kasyacid dharmasya ācayo bhavaty apacayo vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:25_45: tat kasya heto? na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
S06adsp55-u:25_46: ācaye vā apacaye vā hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā.
S06adsp55-u:25_47: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ bodhir na kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā.
S06adsp55-u:25_49: śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:25_51: bahirddhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ (AdSPG I 170) carati,
S06adsp55-u:25_52: kathaṃ dhyāneṣu apramaṇeṣu ārūpyasamāpattiṣu yāvat anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_54: kathaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu carati caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_58: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayacāriṇī buddhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:25_59: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:25_65: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti yāvat prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:25_66: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ na dvayena [f. 258a] dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:25_67: na dvayena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:25_68: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai prathamacittotpādam upādāya.
S06adsp55-u:25_69: yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_70: ye subhūte dvayena caranti, na te vivardhante kuśalamūlaiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:25_71: tat kasya hetoḥ? dvayaniśritā hi subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanās,
S06adsp55-u:25_77: sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena, yair akuśalamūlair avamarditaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patet,
S06adsp55-u:25_78: tad anyair vā akuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhṛyeta,
S06adsp55-u:25_79: yaiḥ saṃhṛyamāno dānapāramitāyāṃ caran kuśalair mūlair na vivardheta,
S06adsp55-u:25_80: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran kuśalamūlair na vivardheta.
S06adsp55-u:25_81: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:25_82: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kusalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? bhagagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_83: no hīdaṃ subhūte, na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:25_86: na aparipūrya kuśalamūlāni. na kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śaktaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:25_87: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ paryupāsya buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair parigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:25_88: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06adsp55-u:25_89: yac ca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante,
S06adsp55-u:25_90_0: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānanidāna-ityuktakajātakavaipulya-adbhutadharmāpadānāpadeśas tat sarvam udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya vācā
S06adsp55-u:25_90_1: suparicitaṃ kṛtvā manasā ca anuprekṣitaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭyā supratividdhaṃ kṛtvā dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate.
S06adsp55-u:25_92: pratisaṃvidbhir utpāditābhis (AdSPG I 172) tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇaśyati yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:25_93: tatra ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06adsp55-u:25_94: yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyeṣv akṣaṇeṣu copapadyate.
S06adsp55-u:25_95: taiś ca kuśalaiḥ mūlaiḥ āśrayapariśuddhiṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:25_96: yair āśrayair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06adsp55-u:25_97: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair na jātu virahito
S06adsp55-u:25_98: bhavati buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya varṇāṃ bhāṣante.
S06adsp55-u:25_99: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:25_100: kuśalamūlāni ca avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:27_1: yaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naiva buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06adsp55-u:27_4: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:27_5: nāsti subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo buddhāṃ bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny aparipūrya kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06adsp55-u:27_6: tat kasya hetor? buddhān eva tāvat paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06adsp55-u:27_7: sevitvā ādy api tāvat sarvākārajñatā na śakyate 'nuprāptuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:27_8: prāg eva aparyupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ aparipūrya kuśalamūlāny asevitvā kalyāṇamitrāṇi sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp55-u:27_9: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena satye bodhiṃ niṣṭhātukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:27_10: kṣipraṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena buddhān bnagavataḥ paryupāsitavyā kuśalamūlāny avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni.
S06adsp55-u:27_11: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ bodisattvo mahāsattvo buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitvā sarvākārajñatāṃ na anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:27_12: upāyakauśalavirahitatvāt, so 'nenopāyo na śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt,
S06adsp55-u:27_14: (AdSPG I 174) tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi na sevitāni.
S06adsp55-u:27_15: ye 'syopāyam upadiśanti. āha: katamad bhagavāṃs tad upāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:27_16: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti,
S06adsp55-u:27_17: buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyas pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo manuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ amanuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:27_18: sa taiḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair samanvāgato na ca asya dāne dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:27_21: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:27_22: dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcitsamarthāḥ sarvadharmā ity asaṃskāralakṣaṇena avatarati.
S06adsp55-u:27_25: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06adsp55-u:27_26: na ca dānaphalam āśaṃsate yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjīta anyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai sattvaparimocanatāyai dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:29_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati.
S06adsp55-u:29_1: tasya naiva rāga cittam āvṛnoti na doṣo na moho na anuśayā na paryutthānāni na anye 'py akuśalā dharmā ye bodheḥ paripanthakarā,
S06adsp55-u:29_2: tadyathā mātsaryaṃ vā dauśīlyaṃ vā kṣobhaṇacittaṃ vā kausīdyacittaṃ vā hīna [f.
S06adsp55-u:29_3: 259a] vīryacittaṃ vā vibhrāntacittaṃ vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā māno vā avamāno vā adhimāno vāsmimāno vā.
S06adsp55-u:29_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty,
S06adsp55-u:29_6: asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:29_7: dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcitsamarthāt sarvadharmā ity asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇena avatarati.
S06adsp55-u:29_10: sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06adsp55-u:29_12: na ca śīlaphalam ākāṇkṣate, yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjīta anyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai sattvaparipācanatāyai śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:31_1: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati.
S06adsp55-u:31_3: na doṣo yāvan na śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā.
S06adsp55-u:31_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati.
S06adsp55-u:31_5: dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcit asamarthāḥ sarvadharmā ity asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇena avatarati.
S06adsp55-u:31_6: so 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate sa kuśalamūlair vivardhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:31_7: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06adsp55-u:31_9: na ca prajñāphalam ākāṃkṣate yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai sattvaparimocanatāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:33_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamadhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāvat caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:33_3_0: na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa upāyakauśalena samanvāgato yenopāyakauśalena tān dhyāna apramāṇaārūpyasamāpattīn
S06adsp55-u:33_4: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya upāyakauśalena samanvāgato darśanabhāvanāprahātavye ca mārge carati,
S06adsp55-u:33_5: na ca srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnoti na sakṛdāgāmīphalaṃ na anāgāmīphalaṃ na arhattvam anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:33_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti yāvad anabhinirvṛttān jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:33_7: teṣu ca bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu caraṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06adsp55-u:33_8: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti.
S06adsp55-u:33_9_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate navānupūrvasamāpattīn samāpadyate
S06adsp55-u:33_9_1: na ca srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnoti yāvan na arhattvam anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp55-u:33_10: tat (AdSPG I 178) kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān [f.
S06adsp55-u:33_12: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu paricayaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:33_13: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca paricayaṃ karoti.
S06adsp55-u:33_14: na ca tāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti yāvan na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati sattvāś ca paripācitā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:33_15: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:33_16: āha: paramabuddhimāṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:33_17: ya evaṃ gaṃbhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp55-u:33_18: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. paramabuddhimān bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ gaṃbhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06adsp55-u:33_19: na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svabhāvato na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_20: āha: kasya svabhāvato na calati? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_21: abhāvān na calati. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha: kasya svabhāvān na calati? rūpasya svabhāvāṃ na calati,
S06adsp55-u:33_22: vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya svabhāvān na calati,
S06adsp55-u:33_25: kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā prajñāpāramitāyā svabhāvān na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_26: dhyānasvabhāvān na calaty apramāṇasvabhāvān na calaty ārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvān na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_28: yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya svabhāvān na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_29: śūnyatāsamādher ānimittasya samādher apraṇihitasya samādheḥ svabhāvān na calaty aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvasamāpattisvabhāvān (AdSPG I 179) na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_30: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvān na calati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvān na calati.
S06adsp55-u:33_32: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_33: na hi subhūte abhāvena abhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:33_34: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_35: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tad abhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_36: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tad abhāvena abhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_37: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tad bhāvena abhāva sakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_38: no hīdaṃ subhūte. āha: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir na abhisamayo bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:33_39: yadi na abhāvena abhāvasya abhisamayo na bhāvena bhāvasya abhisamayaḥ na abhāvena bhāvasya abhisamayo na bhāvena abhāvasya abhisamayaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_40: bhagavān āha: asty abhisamayo, na punar anena catuṣka abhinirhāreṇa.
S06adsp55-u:33_41: āha: katham idāniṃ bhagavann abhisamayaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_42: yatra naiva bhāvo na abhāvaḥ sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayaḥ yatraite prapaṃcā na saṃvidyante,
S06adsp55-u:33_44: āha: kaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_45: rūpaṃ nityam ity anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_46: vedanāsaṃjñasaṃṣkāravijñānaṃ nityam ity anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_47: rūpaṃ sukham iti [f. 260a] vā duḥkham iti vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_48: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_50: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānam ātmety anātmeti (AdSPG I 180) vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_51: rūpaṃ śāntam ity aśāntam iti vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_52: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śāntam ity aśāntam iti vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_53: rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañca.
S06adsp55-u:33_60: catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayitavyāni iti prapañcaḥ catvāry apramāṇāni bhāvayitavyāni iti prapañcaḥ catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayo bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_61: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ catvārariddhipādā bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_62: evaṃ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_63: śūnyatāvimokṣamukham ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukham apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayitavyam iti prapañcaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:33_64: śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmīphalam anāgāmīphalam arhattvaṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_65: pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ daśabodhisattvabhūmīn paripūrayiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:33_69: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_70: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi iti prapañcaḥ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaṃ prahāsyāmi iti prapañcaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_71_0: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati (AdSPG I
S06adsp55-u:33_71_1: 181) vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ nityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati .
S06adsp55-u:33_72: .. nnityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati.
S06adsp55-u:33_73: yāvat sarvākārajñātām anuprāpsyāmi ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati.
S06adsp55-u:33_74: sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaṃ prahāsyāmi ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati.
S06adsp55-u:33_75: tat kasya hetor? na hi svabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ prapañcayati.
S06adsp55-u:33_77: na ca svabhāva abhāvau sthāpayitvā anyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06adsp55-u:33_78: yaḥ prapañcayed yena vā prapañcayed yatra vā prapañcayet.
S06adsp55-u:33_82: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcyāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:33_83: api tu khalu subhūte nāsti rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:33_86: [f. 260b] anena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcyaṃ rūpaṃ niṣprapañcyā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā niṣprapañcyaṃ vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:33_88: evaṃ khalu suhhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati.
S06adsp55-u:33_89: āha: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:33_90: katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
S06adsp55-u:33_91: śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddharmārgeṇa vā? bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:33_92: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati.
S06adsp55-u:33_94: api tu khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati.
S06adsp55-u:33_95: tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamakaḥ sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāmati.
